GSP33brsgor2u:7: 'nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'iti śruternāmatanukṛdapi saṃjñāmūrtivyākartāpi liṅgaśarīropādhinā karteti aṃśa iti ca prathitaḥ prasiddho yastaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ paramātmānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiniyantāraṃ bhaje ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:9: kīrtayati- prathame 'dhyāya iti /. janmādisūtramārabhya jagadutpattyādikāraṇaṃ brahmeti pratipāditaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:12: evaṃ prathamādhyāyasyārthamanūdya tasmin viṣaye virodhaparihāraviṣayiṇaṃ dvitīyādhyāyasyārthaṃ pādaśaḥ saṃkṣipya kathayati- idānīmiti /. atra prathamapāde samanvayasya sāṃkhyādismṛtiyuktibhirvirodhaparihāraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:14: tṛtīyapāde prativedāntaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ jīvātmaśrutīnāṃ ca vyomādimahābhūtānāṃ janmalayakramādikathanenāvirodhaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:21: tatrājñāte viṣaye virodhaśaṅkāsamādhyayogātsamanvayādhyāyānantaryamavirodhādhyāyasya yuktam tatra prathamādhikaraṇatātparyamāha- prathamamiti /. śraute samanvaye virodhanirāsārthatvādasya pādasya śrutiśāstrādhyāyasaṃgatayaḥ svamatasthāpanātmakatvātsarveṣāmadhikaraṇānāmetatpādasaṃgatiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:22: atra pūrvapakṣe smṛtivirodhāduktasamanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:24: sa kiṃ sāṃkhyasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti smṛtiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha- yaduktamiti /. tantryante vyutpādyante tattvānyaneneti tantraṃ śāstraṃ kapiloktam,
GSP33brsgor2u:25: anyāśca pañcaśikhādibhiḥ proktāḥ, evaṃ sati vedāntānāmadvayabrahmasamanvaye nirarthakāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:26: tāsāmapi brahmārthakakatvamastītyavirodha ityata āha- tāsu hīti /. nanu sāṃkhyasmṛtiprāmāṇyāya pradhānavādagrahe manvādismṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityāśaṅkya tāsāṃ dharme sāvakāśatvātpramāṇyaṃ syādityāha- manvādīti
GSP33brsgor2u:27: tarhi sāṃkhyādismṛtīnāmapi dharme tātparyeṇa prāmāṇyamastu, tattvaṃ tu brahmaivetyavirodha ityata āha- naivamiti /. tattve vikalpanānupapatterniravakāśasmṛtyanusāreṇa śrutivyākhyānamucitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:28: sāvakāśaniravakāśayorniravakāśaṃ balīya iti nyāyādityāha- tasmāditi /. śrutivirodhe smṛtyaprāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvātpūrvapakṣo na yukta iti śaṅkate- kathamiti /. ye svātantryeṇa śrutyarthaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti teṣāmayaṃ pūrvapakṣo na bhavet, sāṃkhyavṛddheṣu śraddhālūnāṃ tu bhavedityāha- bhavediti /. teṣāmatīndriyārthajñānavattvācca tatra śraddhā syādityāha- kapilaprabhṛtīnāṃ ceti /. 'ādau yo jāyamānaṃ ca kapilaṃ janayedṛṣim /
GSP33brsgor2u:31: yathā sāṃkhyasmṛtivirodhādbrahmavādastyājya iti tvayocyate tathā smṛtyantaravirodhātpradhānavādāstyājya iti mayocyata iti siddhāntayati- tasya samādhiriti /. tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ sakāśādavyaktaṃ māyāyāṃ līnam /
GSP33brsgor2u:33: itihāsavākyānyuktvā purāṇasaṃmatimāha- ataśceti /. prabhavatyasmāditi prabhavo janmahetuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:39: nanu śrutivirodhaḥ kimiti nokta ityata āha- smṛtibaleneti /. smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe kathaṃ tattvanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha- darśitaṃ tviti /. śrutibhireva tattvanirṇaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:40: smṛtīnāṃ kā gatirityata āha- vipratipattau ceti /. vastutattve smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe vastuni vikalpāyogāt kḷptaśrutimūlāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ, itarāstu kalpyaśrutimūlā na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:41: kḷptaśrutivirodhe smṛtirna pramāṇamityatraḥ jaiminīyanyāyamāha- taduktamiti /. 'audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyet'iti pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhā 'sā sarvā
GSP33brsgor2u:42: veṣṭayitavyā'iti smṛtirmānaṃ na veti saṃdehe, mūlaśrutyanumānānmānamiti prāpte siddhāntaḥ-kḷptaśrutivirodhe smṛtiprāmāṇyamanapekṣamapekṣāśūnyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:44: hi yato 'sati virodhe śrutyanumānaṃ bhavati, atra tu virodhe sati śrutyanumānāyogānmūlābhāvāt sarvaveṣṭanasmṛtirapramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:45: astu sāṃkhyasmṛtiḥ pratyakṣamūletyata āha- na ceti /. yogināṃ siddhimahimnātīndriyajñānaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyamiti śaṅkyate- śakyamiti /. kapilādibhiḥ kilādau vedaprāmāṇyaṃ niścitya tadarthasya dharmasyānuṣṭhānena siddhiḥ saṃpāditā, tayā siddhyā praṇītasmṛtyanusāreṇānādiśrutipīḍā na yuktopajīvyavirodhāditi pariharati- na /
GSP33brsgor2u:47: atiśaṅkitumiti /. śrutīnāṃ mukhyārthamatikramyopacaritārthatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:50: aṅgīkṛtyāpyāha- siddheti /. siddhānāṃ vacanamāśritya vedārthakalpanāyāmapi siddhoktīnāṃ mitho virodhe śrutyāśritamanvādyuktibhireva vedārthanirṇayo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:52: nanu mandamateḥ sāṃkhyasmṛtau śraddhā bhavati tasya matirvedāntamārge kathamāneyetyata āha- paratantretyādinā /. nanu śrutyā kapilasya sarvajñatvoktestanmate śraddhā durvāretyata āha- yā tviti /. kapilaśabdamātreṇa sāṃkhyakartā śrauta iti bhrāntirayuktā, tasya dvaitavādinaḥ sarvajñatvāyogāt
GSP33brsgor2u:53: atra ca sarvajñānasaṃbhṛtatvena śrutaḥ kapilo vāsudevāṃśa eva /
GSP33brsgor2u:54: sa hi sarvātmatvajñānaṃ vaidikaṃ sāṃkhyamupadiśatīti sarvajña iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:56: kiñca yaḥ kapilaṃ jñānairbibharti tamīśvaraṃ paśyediti vidhīyate, tathā cānyārthasya īśvarapratipattiśeṣasya kapilasarvajñatvasya darśanamanuvādastasya mānāntareṇa prāptiśūnyasya
GSP33brsgor2u:57: svārthasādhakatvāyogānnānuvādamātrātsarvajñātvaprasiddhirityāha- anyārtheti /. dvaitavādinaḥ kapilasya śrautatvaṃ nirasya brahmavādino manoḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:58: śrautatvamāha- bhavati ceti /. itihāse 'pi kāpilamatanindāpūrvakamadvaitaṃ darśitamityāha- mahābhārate
GSP33brsgor2u:59: 'pīti /. puruṣā ātmānaḥ kiṃ vastuto bhinnā uta sarvadṛśyānāṃ pratyagātmaḥ eka iti vimarśārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:60: bahūnāṃ puruṣākārāṇāṃ dehānāṃ yathaikā yonirupādānaṃ pṛthvī tathā taṃ puruṣamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ sarvopādānatvena sarvātmakaṃ sarvajñātvādiguṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brsgor2u:70: kāpilatantrasya vedamūlasmṛtivirodhamuktvā sākṣādvedavirodhamāha- śrutiśceti /. yasmiñjñānakāle kevalaṃ svatantraprakṛtikalpanayaiva vedaviruddhaṃ na kintvātmabhedakalpanayāpīti siddhamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:71: smṛtivirodhe vedasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha- vedasya hīti /. vedasya pramāṇyaṃ svataḥsiddhamapauruṣeyatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:72: pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ svārthasmṛtitanmūlānubhavayoḥ kalpanayā pramāṇyaṃ jñeyamiti vyavahitaṃ parataḥprāmāṇyamiti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:75: iha svataḥparataḥpramāṇyayorvaiṣamyājjhaṭiti niścitaprāmāṇyena cānupasaṃjātavirodhinā vedavākyena viruddhasmṛtereva bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:81: mahadahaṅkārau tāvadaprasiddhau, ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha- itareṣāṃ ceti /. nanu 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam'itiśrutiprasiddhāni mahadādīnītyata āha- yadapīti /. sūtratātparyamāha- kāryeti /. sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:82: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha ityata āha- tarketi
GSP33brsgor2u:86: brahmaṇyuktasamanvayaḥ pradhānavādiyogasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe
GSP33brsgor2u:87: pūrvanyāyamatidiśati- etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ /. atideśatvātpūrvavatsaṃgatyādikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:91: na kevalaṃ yoge vidhiḥ kintu yogasya jñāpakānyarthavādavākyānyapi
GSP33brsgor2u:92: santītyāha- liṅgāni ceti /. tāṃ pūrvoktāṃ dhāraṇāṃ yogavido yogaṃ paramaṃ tapa iti manyante /
GSP33brsgor2u:93: uktāmetāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogividhiṃ dhyānaprakāraṃ ca mṛtyuprasādānnaciketā labdhā brahma prāpta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:98: evaṃ yogasmṛteryoge prāmāṇyāttattvāṃśe 'pi prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣamanūdya siddhāntayati- iyamiti /. nanu bauddhādismṛtayo 'tra kimiti na nirākṛtā ityata āha- satīṣvapīti /. tāsāṃ pratārakatvena prasiddhatvādaśiṣṭaiḥ paśuprāyairgṛhītatvādvedabāhyatvāccātropekṣeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:99: tatkāraṇamiti /. teṣāṃ prakṛtānāṃ kāmānāṃ kāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhyāṃ vivekadhyānābhyāmabhipannaṃ pratyaktayā prāptaṃ devaṃ jñātvā sarvapāśairavidyādibhirmucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:100: samūlatve smṛtidvayasya nirāsaḥ kimiti kṛta ityata āha- nirākaraṇaṃ tviti /. iti hetoḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:103: kiṃ sarvāṃśeṣu smṛtyaprāmāṇyaṃ, netyāha- yena tvaṃśeneti /. brahmavādasya kaṇabhakṣādibhirvirodhamāśaṅkyātidiśati- eteneti /. śrutivirodhenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:104: upakārakabādho na yukta ityāśaṅkya yoṃ'śa upakārakaḥ sa na bādhyaḥ kintu tattvāṃśa ityāha- tānyapīti /. tarko 'numānaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:108: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt |
GSP33brsgor2u:110: brahmāsyeti /. pūrvapakṣamākṣipati- kutaḥpunariti /. anavakāśe hetumāha- nanu dharma iveti /. mānāntarānapekṣe vedaikasamadhigamye brahmaṇyanumānātmakatarkasyāpraveśaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:114: nanvekaviṣayatvena virodhe 'pi śrutivirodhānmānāntarameva bādhyatāmityata āha- yathā ceti
GSP33brsgor2u:116: kiñca brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣahetutve pradhānasyāntaraṅgaṃ tarkastasyāparokṣadṛṣṭāntagocaratvena pradhānavadaparokṣārthaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:120: anubhavasya prādhānyaṃ darśayati- anubhavāvasānaṃ ceti /. 'naiṣā tarkeṇa matiḥ'ityarthavādena tarkasya niṣedhamāśaṅkya vidhivirodhānmaivamityāha- śrutirapīti /. evaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ saṃbhāvya cetanabrahmakāraṇavādivedāntasamanvayaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:121: kṣityādikaṃ na cetanaprakṛtikaṃ, kāryadravyatvāt, ghaṭavaditi sāṃkhyayoganyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe smṛtermūlābhāvāddurbalatve
GSP33brsgor2u:122: 'pyanumānasya vyāptimūlatvena prābalyāttena virudhyata iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati- na vilakṣaṇatvāditi /. pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ samanvayāsiddhi, tatsiddhiśceti pūrvavatphalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:123: jaganna brahmaprakṛtikaṃ, tadvilakṣaṇatvāt, yadyadvilakṣaṇaṃ tanna tatprakṛtikaṃ, yathā mṛdvilakṣaṇā rucakādaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:125: tathā ca jagat sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaprakṛtikaṃ, tadanvitatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:126: yaditthaṃ tattathā yathā mṛdanvitā ghaṭādaya ityāha- mṛdaiveti /. vilakṣaṇatvaṃ sādhayati- brahmavilakṣaṇatvaṃ ceti /. yathā hi eka eva strīpiṇḍaḥ patisapatnyupapatīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:128: tatra prītiḥ sukhaṃ, paritāpaḥ śokaḥ, viṣādo bhramaḥ, ādipadādrāgādigrahaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:130: svāmibhṛtyayorvyabhicārāditi śaṅkate- nanu cetanamapīti /. bhṛtyadehasyaiva svāmicetanopakārakatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha- netyādinā
GSP33brsgor2u:131: utkarṣāpakarṣaśūnyatvāccetanānāṃ mitho nopakārakatvamityāha- niratiśayā iti /. tasmādupakārakatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:132: śrutacetanaprakṛtikatvabalena jagaccetanamevetyekadeśimatamutthāpayati- yo 'pīti /. ghaṭādeścetanatvamanupalabdhibādhitamityata āha- avibhāvanaṃ tviti /. antaḥkaraṇānyapariṇāmatvātsato 'pi caitanyasyānupalabdhirityartha /
GSP33brsgor2u:134: vṛttyabhāve caitanyānabhivyaktau dṛṣṭāntaḥ- yatheti /. ātmānātmanoścetanatve svasvāmibhāvaḥ kuta ityata āha- etasmādeveti /. sāmye 'pi prātisvikasvarūpaviśeṣāt śeṣitve dṛṣṭāntaḥ- yathā ceti /. cetanācetanabhedaḥ kathamityata āha- pravibhāgeti /. caitanyābhivyaktyanabhivyaktibhyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:135: sarvasya cetanatvamekadeśyuktamaṅgīkṛtya sāṃkhyaḥ pariharati- tenāpi kathañciditi /. aṅgīkāraṃ tyaktvā sūtraśeṣeṇa pariharati- na cetyādinā /. itaraccetanācetanatvarūpam /
GSP33brsgor2u:141: śrutisāhāyyānna bādhyetyuttarasūtravyāvartyaṃ śaṅkate- nanviti /. mṛdādīnāṃ vaktṛtvādiśrutestadabhimāniviṣayatvāt, tathā 'vijñānaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:146: viśeṣapadasyārthāntaramāha- api ceti /. ahaṃśreyase svasvaśreṣṭhatvāya prāṇā vivadamānā ityuktaprāṇānāṃ cetanavācidevatāpadena viśeṣitatvāt prāṇādipadairabhimānivyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:147: prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā prāṇādhīnā jātā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:148: anugatiṃ bahudhā vyācaṣṭe- anugatāśceti /. tasmai prāṇāya, baliharaṇaṃ vāgādibhiḥ svīyavasiṣṭhatvādiguṇasamarpaṇaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:157: dṛśyate hīti /. hetorasattvānna vyabhicāra iti śaṅkate- nanviti /. yatkiñcidvailakṣaṇyamastīti vyabhicāra ityāha- ucyata iti /. śarīrasya keśādīnāṃ ca prāṇitvāprāṇitvarūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:160: kiñca yayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvastayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vadatā vaktavyaṃ kimātyantikaṃ yatkiñcidveti
GSP33brsgor2u:161: ādye doṣamāha- atyanteti /. dvitīyamāśaṅkya brahmajagatorapi tatsattvātprakṛtivikṛtitvasiddhirityāha- athetyādinā /. vilakṣaṇatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣaṇāntaramāha- vilakṣaṇatvenetyādinā /. jagati samastasya brahmasvabhāvasya cetanatvāderananuvartanānna brahmakāryamiti pakṣe sarvasāmye prakṛtivikāratvamityuktaṃ syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:163: tṛtīye tu dṛṣṭāntābhāva iti /. naca jaganna brahmaprakṛtikamacetanatvādavidyāvaditi dṛṣṭānto 'stīti
GSP33brsgor2u:165: naca dhvaṃse sādhyāvyāpakatā, tasyāpi kāryasaṃskārātmakasya bhāvatvena
GSP33brsgor2u:167: saṃprati kalpatrayasādhāraṇaṃ doṣamāha- āgameti /. pūrvoktamanūdya brahmaṇaḥ śuṣkatarkaviṣayatvāsaṃbhavānna tarkeṇākṣepa
GSP33brsgor2u:170: eṣā brahmaṇi matistarkeṇa svatantreṇa nāpaneyā na saṃpādanīyā /
GSP33brsgor2u:172: kutārkikādanyenaiva vedavidācāryeṇa proktā matiḥ sujñānāyānubhavāya phalāya bhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:173: he preṣṭha, priyatameti naciketasaṃ prati mṛtyorvacanam /
GSP33brsgor2u:174: iyaṃ vividhā sṛṣṭiryataḥ ā samantādbabhūva taṃ ko addhā sākṣādveda /
GSP33brsgor2u:175: tiṣṭhatu vedanaṃ, ka iha loke taṃ pravocat prāvocat /
GSP33brsgor2u:178: prabhavaṃ janma na viduḥ mama sarvāditvena janmābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:181: śrutyā tattve niścite satyanu paścāt puruṣadoṣasyāsaṃbhāvanādernirāsāya gṛhītaḥ śrutyanugṛhītaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:186: somya'ityuktābhedadarśanānniṣprapañcabrahmaikyasaṃbhavaḥ, yathā ghaṭādayo mṛdabhinnāstathā jagadbrahmābhinnaṃ tajjatvādityādistarka āśrīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:187: ito 'nyādṛśatarkasyātra brahmaṇyapraveśādasya cānukūlatvānna tarkeṇākṣepāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:190: yaduktaṃ ekadeśinā sarvasya jagataścetanatvoktau vibhāgaśrutyanupapattiriti dūṣaṇaṃ sāṃkhyena
GSP33brsgor2u:193: sāṃkhyasya tvidaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vajralepāyate, pradhānakāryatve sarvasyācetanatvena cetanācetanakāryavibhāgāsaṃbhavādityāha- 'pītyādinā /. siddhānte cetanācetanavailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāre kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityata āha- pratyuktatvāditi
GSP33brsgor2u:198: kāryamutpatteḥ prāgasadeva syāt, svaviruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogādityapasiddhāntāpattimāśaṅkya mithyātvātkāryasya kālatraye 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:199: kāraṇātmanā sattvamaviruddhamiti samādhatte- asaditicedityādinā /. asatyāditi sattvapratiṣedho nirarthaka ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:200: kāryasatyatvābhāve śrutimāha- sarvaṃ tamiti /. mithyātvamajānataḥ śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati- nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor2u:205: satkāryavādasiddhyarthaṃ kāryābhede kāraṇasyāpi kāryavadaśuddhyādiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāsūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- atrāheti /. pratisaṃsṛjyamānapadasya vyākhyā- kāraṇeti /. yathā jale līyamānaṃ lavaṇadravyaṃ jalaṃ dūṣayati tadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:206: sūtrasya yojanāntaramāha- apiceti /. sarvasya kāryasyāpītau kāraṇavadekarūpatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:207: arthāntaramāha- apiceti /. karmādīnāmutpattinimittānāṃ pralaye 'pi bhoktṛṇāmutpattau tadvadeva muktānāmapyutpattiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:208: śaṅkāpūrvakaṃ vyākhyāntaramāha- atheti /. yadi layakāle 'pikāryaṃ kāraṇādvibhaktaṃ tarhi sthitikālavallayābhāvaprasaṅgātkāryeṇa dvaitāpatteścāsamañjasamidaṃ darśanamityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor2u:212: apītau jagat svakāraṇaṃ na dūṣayati, kāraṇe līnatvāt, mṛdādiṣu nīlaghaṭādivaditi siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- naivetyādinā /. apigacchat līyamānam /
GSP33brsgor2u:215: kiñca dūṣakatve kāryasya sthitiḥ syāllavaṇavadityāha- apītireveti /. asati kārye taddharmeṇa kāraṇasya yogo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:217: nanu satkāryavāde laye 'pi kāryasya kāraṇābhedena sattvāddūṣakatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:218: syādityata āha- ananyatve 'pīti /. kalpitasyādhiṣṭhānadharmavattvamabhedānna tvadhiṣṭhānasya kalpitakāryadharmavattvaṃ tasya kāryātpṛthaksattvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:219: kiñcāpītāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthamiti pratibandyā samādhatte- atyalpaṃ ceti /. pariṇāmadṛṣṭāntaṃ vyākhyāya vivartadṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe- asti ceti /. māyāvyanupādānamityarucyā dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha- yatheti /. astyeva svapnakāle dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsarga ityata āha- prabodheti /. jāgratsuṣuptyoḥ svapnenātmano 'sparśāt tatkāle 'pyasparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:220: yadyajñasya jīvasyāvasthābhirasaṃsargastadā sarvajñasya kiṃ vācyamiti dārṣṭāntikamāha- evamiti /. yadvā jāgajjanmasthitilayā īśvarasyāvasthātrayam /
GSP33brsgor2u:221: tadasaṅgitve vṛddhasaṃmatimāha- atroktamiti /. yadā tattvamasītyupadeśakāle prabudhyate māyānidrāṃ tyajati tadā janmalayasthityavasthāśūnyamadvaitamīśvaramātmatvenānubhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:222: phalitamāha- tatreti /. dvitīyamasāmañjasyamanūdya tenaiva sūtreṇa pariharati- yatpunariti /. suṣuptāvajñānasattve punarvibhāgotpattau ca mānamāha- śrutiśceti /. sati brahmaṇyekībhūya na vidurityajñānoktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:223: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:224: nanu suṣuptau punarvibhāgaśaktyajñānasattve 'pi sarvapralaye tatsattvaṃ kuta ityata āha- yathā hīti /. yathā suṣuptau paramātmani sarvakāryāṇāmavibhāge 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:227: yataḥ sthitāvidānīṃ mithyājñānakāryo vibhāgavyavahārastattvabodhābhāvāt svapnavadabādhito dṛśyate, ataḥ kāryadarśanātkāraṇasattvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:233: vailakṣaṇyādīnāṃ sāṃkhyapakṣe 'pi doṣatvānnāsmābhistannirāsaprayāsaḥ kārya ityāha- svapakṣeti
GSP33brsgor2u:235: ata eveti /. satyakāryasya viruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogāt sāṃkhyasyaivāyaṃ doṣo na kāryamithyātvavādina iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:239: yadi vyavasthārthaṃ muktānāṃ bhedāḥ saṃghātaviśeṣāḥ pradhāne līyante baddhānāṃ bhedāstu na līyanta ityucyate tarhyalīnānāṃ puruṣavatkāryatvavyāghāta ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brsgor2u:242: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ |
GSP33brsgor2u:243: kiñca tarkasya saṃbhāvitadoṣatvāttena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayo na bādhya
GSP33brsgor2u:244: ityāha- tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapīti /. puruṣamatīnāṃ vicitratve 'pi kapilasya sarvajñatvāttadīyatarke viśvāsa iti
GSP33brsgor2u:245: śaṅkate- atheti /. 'kapilo yadi sarvajñaḥ kaṇādo neti kā pramā'iti nyāyena pariharati- evamapīti /. sūtramadhyasthaśaṅkābhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe- athocyeteti /. vilakṣaṇatvāditarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhitatve 'pi vyāptipakṣadharmatāsaṃpannaḥ kaścittarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati tena pradhānamanumeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:246: nanu so 'pyapratiṣṭhitaḥ tarkajātīyatvāt vilakṣaṇatvādivadityata āha- nahīti /. tarkajātīyatvāditi tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:251: pravṛttinivṛttivyavahārahetutvānnāpratiṣṭhetyāha- sarvatarketi /. adhvā viṣayaḥ pākabhojanādirviṣabhakṣaṇādiśca, tatsāmānyena pākatvādinānāgataviṣaye pākādau sukhaduḥkhahetutvānumityā pravṛttyādirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:252: kiñca pūrvottaramīmāṃsayostarkeṇaiva vākyatātparyanirṇayasya kriyamāṇatvāttarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāha- śrutyartheti /. manurapi keṣāñcittarkāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ manyata ityāha- manuriti /. dharmasya śuddhiradharmādbhedanirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:253: kasyacittarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvamaṅgīkaroti- ayameveti /. sarvatarkāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣa eva na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:255: vadantamupahasati- nahīti /. kvacittarkasya pratiṣṭhāyāmapi jagatkāraṇaviśeṣe tarkasya svātantryaṃ nāstīti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe- yadyapītyādinā /. atigambhīratvaṃ brahmaṇo vedānyamānāgamyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:258: brahmaṇo vedānyamānāgamyatvaṃ darśayati- rūpāditi /. avimokṣo muktyabhāva ityarthāntaramāha- apicetyādinā /. ekarūpavastujñānasya samyagjñānatve 'pi tarkajanyatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata
GSP33brsgor2u:259: āha- tatraivaṃ satīti /. tarkotthajñānānāṃ mitho vipratipatterna samyagjñānatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:261: ekarūpeṇānavasthito viṣayo yasya tattarkaprabhavaṃ kathaṃ samyagjñānaṃ bhavediti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:262: nanu sāṃkhyasya śreṣṭhatvāttañjñānaṃ samyagityāśaṅkya hetvasiddhimāha- naca pradhāneti /. nanu sarvatārkikairmilitvā niścitatarkotthā matirmuktiheturityata āha- naca śakyanta iti /. tasmāt tarkotthajñānānmuktyayogāt tarkeṇa vedāntasamanvayabādho na yuktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:270: sa kiṃ yadvibhu tanna dravyopādānamiti vaiśeṣikādinyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe sāṃkhyavṛddhānāṃ tarkākuśalamatitve 'pi vaiśeṣikādīnāṃ tarkamatikuśalatvaprasiddhestadīyanyāyasyābādhitatvādvirudhyata iti
GSP33brsgor2u:272: nanu sāṃkhyamatasyopadeśastārkikamatasyātideśaḥ kimiti kṛto vaiparītyasyāpi saṃbhavādityāśaṅkya pūrvottarādhikaraṇayorupadeśātideśabhāve kāraṇamāha- vaidikasyeti /. satkāryatvātmāsaṅgatvasvaprakāśatvādyaṃśairvedāntaśāstrasya pratyāsannaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:273: pradhānavādaḥ śiṣṭairdebalādibhiḥ satkāryatvāṃśena svīkṛta iti prabalatvādupadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:274: aṇvādivādānāṃ nirmūlatvena durbalatvena durbalatvādatideśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:275: kiṃ nirākaraṇakāraṇamiti praṣṭavyaṃ nāstītyāha- tulyatvāditi /. kāraṇamevāha- tulyamiti /. yaduktaṃ vibhutvānna dravyopādānaṃ brahmeti, tatra pakṣasādhakatvena śruterupajīvyatvāttayā bādhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:277: ataḥ samanvayasya tārkikanyāyena na virodha iti siddham //12//
GSP33brsgor2u:282: sa kiṃ yanmitho bhinnaṃ tannādvitīyakāraṇābhinnaṃ yathā mṛttantujau ghaṭapaṭhāviti tarkasahitabhedapratyakṣādinā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe brahmaṇi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatve 'pi jagadbhede pratiṣṭhitatvādvirudhyata iti pūrvapakṣayati- bhokrāpatteriti /. virodhādadvaitāsiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:283: anapekṣaśrutyāsvārthanirṇayāttarkeṇākṣepo na yukta ityuktamiti śaṅkate- yadyapīti /. mānāntarāyogyaśrutyarthe bhavatyanākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:284: yastvadvitīyabrahmābhedādbhūjalādīnāmabhedo brahmopādānakatvaśrutiviṣayaḥ sa 'ādityo yūpaḥ'ityarthavādārthavanmānāntarayogya eveti dvaitapramāṇerapahriyata iti samādhatte- tathāpīti /. anyaparatvaṃ gauṇārthakatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:285: svaviṣaye jagadbhede tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvāttenākṣepa ityāha- tarko
GSP33brsgor2u:286: 'pīti /. tarkāderdvaite prāmāṇye 'pi tataḥ samanvayavirodhe kimāyātamiti śaṅkate- kimata iti /. pūrvapakṣī samādhatte- ata iti /. tarkādeḥ prāmāṇyāt dvaitabādhakatvaṃ śruterayuktamityadvaitasamanvayabādho yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:287: iyamarthaṃ śaṅkāpūrvakaṃ sphuṭayati- kathamityādinā /. nanu bhoktṛbhogyayormitha ekatvaṃ kenoktamityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor2u:288: śrutārthāpattyetyāha- tayośceti /. tayorekabrahmābhedaśravaṇādekatvaṃ kalpyate, ekasmādabhinnayorbhede ekasyāpi bhedāpatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:290: iṣṭāpattiṃ vārayati- na cāsyeti /. śrutergauṇārthatvena sāvakāśatvānniravakāśadvaitamānabādho na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:291: nanu vibhāgasyādhunikatvādanadyādvaitaśrutyā bādha ityata āha- yatheti
GSP33brsgor2u:294: evaṃ prāpte pariṇāmadṛṣṭāntenāpātataḥ siddhāntamāha- syāllokavaditi /. dṛṣṭānte 'pi kathamekasamudrābhinnānāṃ pariṇāmānāṃ mitho bhedaḥ, kathaṃ vā teṣāṃ bhede satyekasmādabhinnatvamityāśaṅkya na hi dṛṣṭenupapattiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:295: nyāyenāha- naceti /. evaṃ bhoktṛbhogyayormitho bhedo brahmābhedaścetyāha- evamiheti /. jīvasya brahmavikāratvābhāvāddṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamiti śaṅkate- yadyapīti /. aupādhikaṃ janmāstīti taraṅgādisāmyamāha- tathāpīti /. vibhāgo janma /
GSP33brsgor2u:297: nanu bhoktuḥ pratidehaṃ vibhāgaḥ kathamityata āha- kāryamanupraviṣṭasyeti
GSP33brsgor2u:298: aupādhikavibhāge phalitamupasaṃharati- ityata iti /. ekabrahmabhinnatve 'pi bhoktrādestaraṅgādivadbhedāṅgīkārānna dvaitamānenādvaitasamanvayasya virodha ityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33brsgor2u:302: pūrvasminneva pūrvapakṣe vivartavādena mukhyaṃ samādhānamāha- tadānanyatvamiti /. samānaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatiṃ vadannubhayoḥ parihārayoḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:303: pariṇāmavivartāśrayatvenārthabhedamāha- abhyupagamyeti /. pratyakṣādīnāma utsargikaprāmāṇyamaṅgīkṛtya sthūlabuddhisamādhānārthaṃ pariṇāmadṛṣṭāntena bhedābhedāvuktau, saṃpratyaṅgīkṛtaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:304: tattvāvedakatvātpracyāvya vyāvahārikatve sthāpyate, tathāca mithyādvaitagrāhipramāṇairadvaitaśruterna bādhaḥ, ekasyāṃ rajjvāṃ daṇḍasragādidvaitadarśanādityayaṃ mukhyaḥ parihāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:305: evamadvaitasamanvayasyāvirodhārthaṃ dvaitasya mithyātvaṃ sādhayati- yasmāttayoriti /. svarūpaikye kāryakāraṇatvavyāghāta ityata āha- vyatirekeṇeti /. kāraṇātpṛthaksattvaśūnyatvaṃ kāryasya sādhyate naikyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:306: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na kāraṇātpṛthagastītyevakārārtha iti śrutiṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:307: yojayati- etaduktamiti /. ārambhaṇaśabdārthāntaramāha- punaśceti /. apāgādagnitvamapagataṃ kāraṇamātratvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:310: jīvagajatorbrahmānyatve pratijñābādha ityāha- na cānyatheti /. tayorananyatve krameṇa dṛṣṭāntāvāha- tasmādyatheti /. pratijñābalādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:312: śuddhādvaitaṃ svamatamuktvā bhedābhedamatamutthāpayati- nanviti /. anekābhiḥ śaktibhistadadhīnaprakṛtibhiḥ pariṇāmairyuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:313: bhedābhedamate sarvavyavasthāsiddhiratyantābhede dvaitamānabādha ityabhimanyamāno dūṣayati- naivaṃ syāditi /. evakāravācārambhaṇaśabdābhyāṃ vikārasattāniṣedhātpariṇāmavādaḥ śrutibāhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:314: kiñca saṃsārasya satyatve tadviśiṣṭasya jīvasya brahmaikyopadeśo na
GSP33brsgor2u:315: syādvirodhādityāha- sa ātmeti /. ekatvaṃ jñānakarmasamuccayasādhyamityupadeśārthamityāśaṅkyā asītipadavirodhānmaivamityāha- svayamiti /. atastattvajñānabādhyatvātsaṃsāritvaṃ mithyetyāha- ataśceti /. svataḥ-siddhopadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:316: yaduktaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ nānātvaṃ satyamiti, tatkiṃ jñānādūrdhvaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ prāgvā
GSP33brsgor2u:317: nādya ityāha- bādhite ceti /. svabhāvo 'trāvidyā tayā kṛtaḥ svābhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:321: yattu pramātṛtvādivyavahāraḥ satya eva mokṣāvasthāyāṃ nivartata iti,
GSP33brsgor2u:322: tannetyāha- na cāyamiti /. saṃsārasatyatve tadavasthāyāṃ jīvasya brahmatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:325: kiñca yathā loke kaścit taskarabuddhyā bhaṭairgṛhīto 'nṛtavādī
GSP33brsgor2u:326: cettaptaparaśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa dahyate badhyate ca, tathā nānātvavādī dahyate
GSP33brsgor2u:328: tathaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamityekatvadarśī mucyata iti śrutadṛṣṭāntenaikatvaṃ satyaṃ nānātvaṃ mithyetyāha- taskareti /. vyavahāragocaro nānātvavyavahārāśrayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:329: nānātvanindayāpyekatvameva satyamityāha- mṛtyoriti /. kiñcāsminbhedābhedamate jīvasya brahmābhedajñānādbhedajñānanivṛttermuktiriṣṭā sā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:330: bhramatvānabhyupagamāt, pramāyāḥ pramāntarābādhyatvādityāha- na cāsminniti /. vaiparītyasyāpi saṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:335: nanu karmakārakāṇāṃ yajamānādīnāṃ vidyākārakāṇāṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ca kalpitabhedamāśritya karmajñānakāṇḍayoḥ pravṛtteḥ svaprameyasya
GSP33brsgor2u:336: dharmāderabādhātprāmāṇyamavyāhatamityāśaṅkyāha- kathaṃ cānṛteneti /. dhūlikalpitadhūmenānumitasya vahneriva prameyabādhāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:337: tatra dvaitaviṣaye pratyakṣādīnāṃ yāvadbādhaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapadyata ityāha- atrocyata ityādinā /. satyatvaṃ bādhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:339: vastuto mithyātve 'pi vikāreṣu tanniścayābhāvena pratyakṣādivyavahāropapattāvuktadṛṣṭāntaṃ vivṛṇoti- yathā suptasya prākṛtasyeti /. evaṃ dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vyavahārakāle bādhaśūnyārthabodhakatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapādya dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vedāntānāṃ sarvakāleṣu bādhaśūnyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ tāttvikaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:340: prāmāṇyamupapādayitumuktaśaṅkāmanuvadati- kathaṃ tvasatyeneti /. kimasatyātsatyaṃ na jāyate, kimuta satyasya jñānaṃ na /
GSP33brsgor2u:343: aṅgīkṛtyāpi dṛṣṭāntamāha- naiṣa doṣa iti /. sarpeṇādaṣṭasyāpi daṣṭatvabhrāntikalpitaviṣātsatyamaraṇamūrcchādidarśanādasatyāt satyaṃ na jāyata ityaniyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:344: dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha- svapneti /. asatyātsarpodarādeḥ satyasya daṃśanasnānādijñānasya kāryasya darśanādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:345: yathāśrutamādāya śaṅkate- tatkāryamapīti /. uktamarthaṃ prakaṭayati- tatra brūma ityādinā /. avagatirvṛttiḥ ghaṭādivatsatyāpi prātibhāsikasvapnadṛṣṭavastunaḥ phalaṃ caitanyaṃ vā vṛttyabhivyaktamavagatiśabdārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:346: prasaṅgāddehātmavādo 'pi nirasta ityāha- eteneti /. svapnasthāvagateḥ svapnadehadharmatva utthitasya mayā tādṛśaḥ svapno
GSP33brsgor2u:349: asatyātsatyasya jñānaṃ na jāyata iti dvitīyaniyamasya śrutyā
GSP33brsgor2u:350: vyabhicāramāha- tathāca śrutiriti /. naca striyo mithyātve 'pi taddarśanātsatyādeva satyāyāḥ samṛtdherjñānamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:351: vācyam, viṣayaviśiṣṭatvena darśanasyāpi mithyātvātprakṛte 'pi satye brahmaṇi mithyāvedānugatacaitanyāñjñānasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:352: asatyātsatyasyeṣṭasya jñānamuktvāniṣṭasya jñānamāha- tatheti /. asatyātsatyasya jñāne dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha- tathākārādīti /. rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddhamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:353: evamasatyātsatyasya janmoktyā tadarthakriyākāri tatsatyamiti niyamo bhagnaḥ, anṛtātsatyasya jñānoktyā yadanṛtakaraṇagamyaṃ tadbādhyaṃ kūṭaliṅgānumitavahnivaditi vyāptirbhagnā /
GSP33brsgor2u:354: tathā ca kalpitānāmapi vedāntānāṃ satyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:357: kiñca yadyubhayorekadā vyavahāraḥ syāt tadā syādapi satyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:359: ekatvajñānena carameṇānapekṣeṇa nānātvasya niḥśeṣaṃ bādhāt, śuktijñāneneva
GSP33brsgor2u:360: rajatasyetyāha- api cāntyamiti /. nanūpajīvyadvaitapramāṇavirodhādekatvāvagatirnotpadyata ityata āha- na ceyamiti /. tat kilātmatattvamasya piturvākyāt śvetaketurvijñātavāniti jñānotpatteḥ śrutatvātsāmagrīsattvāccetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:361: vyāvahārikaguruśiṣyādibhedamupajīvya jñāyamānavākyārthāvagateḥ pratyakṣādigataṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupajīvyaṃ, tacca pāramārthikaikatvāvagatyā na virudhyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:362: kintu tayā virodhādanupajīvyaṃ pratyakṣādestāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:363: kiñcaikatvāvagateḥ phalavatpramātvānniṣphalo dvaitabhramo bādhya ityāha- na ceyamiti /. nanu sarvasya dvaitasya mithyātve svapno mithyā jāgrata satyamityādirlaukiko vyavahāraḥ, satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyamabhavaditi vaidikaśca kathamityāśaṅkya yathā svapne idaṃ satyamidamanṛtamiti tātkālikabādhābādhābhyāṃ vyavahārastathā
GSP33brsgor2u:364: dīrghasvapna'pītyuktasvapnadṛṣṭāntaṃ smārayati- prākceti /. vyavahārārthe nānātvaṃ satyamiti kalpanamasaṃgatamityupasaṃharati- tasmāditi /. nedaṃ kalpitaṃ, kintu śrutamiti śaṅkate- nanviti /. kāryakāraṇayorananyatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ, na pariṇāmitve, brahmaṇaḥ kūṭasthatvaśrutivirodhāditi pariharati- netyucyata iti /. sṛṣṭau pariṇāmitvaṃ pralaye tadrāhitya ca krameṇāviruddhamiti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsgor2u:365: śaṅkate- sthitīti /. kūṭasthasya kadācidapi vikriyā na yuktā kūṭasthatvavyāghātādityāha- neti
GSP33brsgor2u:366: kūṭasthatvāsiddhimāśaṅkyāha- kūṭasthasyeti /. kūṭasthasya niravayavasya pūrvarūpatyāgenāvasthāntarātmakapariṇāmāyogācchuktirajatavadvivarta eva prapañca iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:368: satyatetyāha- naca yathetyādinā /. 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati'iti śruterbrahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmitvavijñānāttatprāptirviduṣaḥ phalamityāśaṅkyāha- nahi pariṇāmavattveti /. 'brahmavidāpnoti param'iti śrutakūṭasthanityamokṣaphalasaṃbhave duḥkhānityapariṇāmitvaphalakalpanāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:370: adhunā tadananyatvamityantābhedapratipādane īśitrīśitavyabhedābhāvāttadvirodhaḥ syāditi śaṅkate- kūṭastheti /. kalpitadvaitamapekṣyeśvaratvādikaṃ paramārthato 'nanyatvamityavirodhamāha- netyādinā /. avidyātmake cidātmani līne nāmarūpe eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ sthūlātmanā sṛṣṭistadapekṣatvādīśvaratvāderna virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:374: saṃskārātmakanāmarūpayoravidyaikyavivakṣayā brūte- māyeti /. nāmarūpe cedīśvarasyātmabhūte tarhīśvaro jaḍa ityata āha- tābhyāmanya iti /. anyatve vyākaraṇe ca śrutimāha- ākāśa ityādinā /. avidyādyupādhinā kalpitabhedena bimbasthānasyeśvaratvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:375: pratibimbabhūtānāṃ jīvānāṃ niyamyatvamityāha- sa ca svātmabhūtāniti /. na cātra nānājīvā bhāṣyoktā iti bhramitavyaṃ, buddhyādisaṃghātabhedena bhedokteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:377: paramārthata īśvaratvādidvaitābhāve śrutimāha- tathā ceti /. kathaṃ tarhi kartṛtvādikamityata āha- svabhāvastviti /. anādyavidyaiva kartṛtvādirūpeṇa pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:380: tena svarūpajñānāvaraṇena kartāhamīśvaro me niyantetyevaṃ bhramanti /
GSP33brsgor2u:381: uktārthaḥ sūtrakārasaṃmata ityāha- sūtrakāro 'pīti /. na kevalaṃ laukikavyavahārārthaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāśrayaṇaṃ kintūpāsanārthaṃ cetyāha- pariṇāmaprakriyāṃ ceti /. taduktam-'kṛpaṇādhīḥ pariṇāmamudīkṣate kṣayitakalmaṣadhīstu vivartatām'iti
GSP33brsgor2u:385: evaṃ tadananyatve pratyakṣādivirodhaṃ parihṛtyānumānamāha- bhāve ceti /. kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:387: anyatve 'pyayaṃ hetuḥ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya nirasyati- naceti /. mṛdghaṭayoranyatve gavāśvayoriva hetūcchittiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:389: ato mṛdghaṭayostena hetunā nimittādibhāvaḥ sidhyati nānanyatvamityarthāntaratāmāśaṅkāyaha- naca kulāleti /. na copādānopādeyabhāvenārthāntaratā, mṛddṛṣṭānte tadbhāvābhāve 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:393: yathāśrutasūtrasthahetorvyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate- nanviti /. agnibhāva eva dhūmopalabdhiriti niyamātmako hetustatra nāstītyāha- neti
GSP33brsgor2u:395: ityāśaṅkate- atheti /. tadbhāvaniyatabhāvatve sati tadbuddhyanuraktabuddhiviṣayatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha- naivamiti /. ālokabuddhyanuraktabuddhigrāhye rūpe vyabhicāranirāsāya satyantam /
GSP33brsgor2u:398: tathā ca tayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorbhāvena sattayānuraktāṃ sahakṛtāmiti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:402: anumānārthatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya pāṭhāntareṇa pratyakṣaparatayā vyācaṣṭe- bhāvācceti
GSP33brsgor2u:404: na caikaḥ paṭa iti pratyakṣaṃ paṭasya tantubhyaḥ pṛthaksattve pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:406: ata ātānavitānasaṃyogavantastantava eva paṭa iti pratyakṣopalabdheḥ sattvādananyatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:407: paṭanyāyaṃ tantvādāvatidiśati- tathetyādinā /. pratyakṣopalabdhyā tattatkārye kāraṇamātraṃ pariśiṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:408: yatra pratyakṣaṃ nāsti tatra kārye vimatakāraṇādabhinnaṃ, kāryatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:409: paṭavadityanumeyamityāha- anayeti /. kāraṇapariśeṣe pradhānādikaṃ pariśiṣyatāṃ, na brahmetyata āha-ta tra sarveti /. brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tātparyasyoktatvāttadevādvitīyaṃ pariśiṣyate na kāraṇāntaramaprāmāṇikatvāditi bhāvaḥ //15//
GSP33brsgor2u:413: idaṃ jagat sadātmaiveti sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutyā sṛṣṭeḥ prākkāryasya kāraṇātmanā sattvaṃ śrutaṃ, tadanyathānupapattyotpannasyāpi jagataḥ kāraṇādananyatvamityāha sūtrakāraḥ sattvācceti śrutyarthe yuktimapyāha- yacca yadātmaneti /. ghaṭādikaṃ prāg mṛdādyātmanā vartate tata utpadyamānatvāt sāmānyato vyatirekeṇa sikatābhyastailavadityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:414: kāraṇavatkāryasyāpi sattvāt sattvabhede mānābhāvāt kāryasya kāraṇādabhinnasattākatvamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramāha- yathā ceti /. idānīṃ sataḥ kāryasya prāguttarakālayorasattvāyogāt sattvāvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:416: tadabhedena satī mṛt san ghaṭa iti bhāsamānayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorananyatvamityarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor2u:423: vastutaḥ sarvatra sattaikye 'pi ghaṭapaṭayorabhedena sattāyā bhinnatvānna
GSP33brsgor2u:427: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt |
GSP33brsgor2u:428: uktaṃ kāryasya prāk kāraṇātmanā sattvamasiddhamityāśaṅkya samādhatte- asaditi /. 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhyāt'ityupakrame kenāktā iti saṃdehe 'tejo vai
GSP33brsgor2u:431: āsīdityatītakālasaṃbandhokteścāsadavyākṛtameva na śūnyamityāha- asataśca pūrvāpareti /. uktanyāyaṃ vākyāntare 'tidiśati- asadveti /. kriyamāṇatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ śūnyasyāsaṃbhavīti bhāvaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor2u:435: sattvānanyatvayorhetvantaramāha sūtrakāraḥ- yukteriti /. dadhyādyarthināṃ kṣīrādau pravṛttyanyathānupapattiryuktistayā kāryasya prākkāraṇānanyatvena sattvaṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:437: pravṛttirityanyathopapattimāśaṅkyāha- aviśiṣṭe hīti /. asata utpattyabhāvādutpattau vā sarvasmātsarvotpattiprasaṅgāttattadupādānaviśeṣe pravṛttirna
GSP33brsgor2u:442: kāryasyāsattve 'pi kutaścidatiśayātpravṛttiniyamopapattiriti śaṅkate- atheti /. atiśayaḥ kāryadharmaḥ kāraṇadharmo vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:443: ādye dharmitvātprāgavasthārūpasya kāryasya sattvaṃ durvāramityāha- tarhyatiśayavattvāditi /. dvitīye 'pi kāryasattvamāyātītyāha- śaktiśceti /. kāryakāraṇābhyāmanyā kāryavadasati vā śaktirna kāryaniyāmikā, yasya kasyacidanyasya naraśṛṅgasya vā niyāmakatvaprasaṅgādanyatvāsattvayoḥ śaktāvanyatra cāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:446: kiñca kāryakāraṇayoranyatve mṛdghaṭau bhinnau santāviti bhedabuddhiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:447: syādityāha- apiceti /. tayoranyatve 'pi samavāyaśāttathā buddhirnodetītyāśaṅkya samavāyaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:448: dūṣayati- samavāyeti /. samavāyaḥ samavāyibhiḥ saṃbaddhona na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:449: ādye sa saṃbandhaḥ kiṃ samavāyaḥ uta svarūpam /
GSP33brsgor2u:452: asaṃbaddha iti pakṣe doṣamāha- anabhyupagamyamāna iti /. dravyaguṇādīnāṃ viśiṣṭadhīvirahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:454: viśiṣṭadhīniyāmako hi saṃbandhaḥ, na tasya niyāmakāntarāpekṣā,
GSP33brsgor2u:455: anavasthānāt, ataḥ svaparanirvāhakaḥ samavāya iti śaṅkate- atheti /. saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:457: pratibandyā dūṣayati- saṃyogo 'pīti /. yattu guṇatvātsaṃyogasya samavāyāpekṣā na saṃbandhatvāditi, tanna,
GSP33brsgor2u:463: ataḥ samavāyasiddheḥ prāk saṃyogasya guṇatvamasiddhamiti dik /
GSP33brsgor2u:464: kiñca pratītyanusāreṇa vastu svīkāryamanyathā gopratiteraśva ālambanamityasyāpi suvacatvāt
GSP33brsgor2u:465: tathā ca mṛdghaṭa ityabhedapratīterabheda eva svīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:466: tābhyāmatyantabhinnasya samavāyasya tanniyāmakatvāsaṃbhavādityāha- tādātmyeti /. evaṃ pratītyanusāreṇa kāryasya kāraṇātmanā sattvaṃ, svarūpeṇa tu mithyātmityuktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:467: vṛttyanirūpaṇācca tasya mithyātvamityāha- kathaṃ ceti /. tatrādyamanūdyavayavinaḥ paṭādestantvādiṣvavayaveṣu tritvādivatsvarūpeṇa vṛttirutāvayavaśa iti vikalpādyaṃ dūṣayati- yadītyādinā /. vyāsajyavṛttivastupratyakṣasya yāvadāśrayapratyakṣajanyatvāt saṃvṛtapaṭāderyāvadavayavānāmapratyakṣatvādapratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:468: dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate- atheti /. yathā haste kośe cāvayavaśaḥ khaṅgo vartamāno hastamātragrahe 'pi gṛhyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:470: syāditi dūṣayati- tadāpīti /. ādyadvitīyamudbhāvya dūṣayati- atha pratyavayavamityādinā /. ekasmiṃstantau paṭavṛttikāle tantvantare vṛttirna syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:472: yathā yugapadanekavyaktiṣu vṛttāvapi jāteranekatvadoṣo nāsti tathāvayavina
GSP33brsgor2u:473: ityāśaṅkate- gotveti /. jātivadavayavino vṛttirasiddhā anubhavābhāviditi pariharati- na /
GSP33brsgor2u:475: yathā devadattaḥ svakāryamadhyayanaṃ grāme 'raṇye vā karoti, yathā gauravayavī svakāryaṃ kṣīrādikaṃ śṛṅgapucchādāvapi kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:477: saṃpratyasatkāryavāde doṣāntaramāha- prāgiti /. yathā ghaṭaścalatītyukte calanakriyāṃ pratyāśrayatvarūpaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ghaṭasya bhāti tathā paṭo jāyata iti janikriyākartṛtvamanubhūyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:482: sattvātkartṛtvamityāśaṅkayāha- ghaṭasya ceti /. ghaṭotpattivadasatkapālādyutpattirityatidiśati- tatheti /. śaṅkāmanūdya doṣamāha- tathā ceti /. anubhavavirodhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:483: utpattirbhāvasyādya vikriyeti svamatena kāryasattvamānītaṃ, saṃprati kāryasyotpattirnāma svakāraṇe samavāyaḥsvasmin sattāsamavāyo veti
GSP33brsgor2u:484: tārkikamatamāśaṅkate- atheti /. tanmatenāpi kāryasya sattvamāvaśyakaṃ, asataḥ saṃbandhitvāyogādityāha- kathamiti /. asatorveti dṛṣṭāntoktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:485: nanu naraśṛṅgādivatkāryaṃ sarvadā sarvatrāsanna bhavati kintūtpatteḥ prāk dhvaṃsānantaraṃ cāsat madhye tu sadeveti
GSP33brsgor2u:488: nanu kārakavyāpārādūrdhvabhāvinaḥ kāryasya vandhyāputratulyatvaṃ kathamityata āha- yadi ceti
GSP33brsgor2u:490: kastarhi nirṇayaḥ, tatrāha- vayaṃ tviti /. 'nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ'iti smṛteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:491: satkāryavāde kārakavaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkate- nanviti /. siddhakāraṇānanyatvācca kāryasya siddhatvamityāha- tadananyatvācceti /. anirvācyakāryātmanā kāraṇasyābhivyaktyarthaḥ kārakavyāpāra ityāha- naiṣa doṣa iti /. kāryasatyatvamicchatāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ satkāryavāde kārakavaiyarthyaṃ doṣa āpatati, abhivyakterapi sattvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:493: vicāryamāṇe sarvamayuktaṃ, yuktatve dvaitāpatteriti mukhyaṃ samādhānaṃ samādhānāntarābhāvāt
GSP33brsgor2u:494: nanu kāraṇādbhinnamasadevotpadyata iti samādhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāsatpakṣasya dūṣaṇamuktaṃ smaretyāha- kāryākāro 'pīti /. ataḥ kāraṇādbhedābhedābhyāṃ durnirūpasya sadasadvilakṣaṇasyānirvācyābhivyaktiranirvācyakārakavyāpārāṇāṃ phalamiti pakṣa eva śreyāniti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:496: tathāca ghaṭo mṛdbhinnaḥ, tadviruddhaviśeṣavattvāt, vṛkṣavadityata āha- naceti /. vastuto 'nyatvaṃ satyo bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:497: hetorvyabhicārasthalāntaramāha- tathā pratidinamiti /. pratyahaṃ pitrādidehasyāvasthābhede 'pi janmanāśayorabhāvādabhedo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:498: dārṣṭāntike tu mṛdādināśe sati ghaṭādikaṃ jāyata iti janmavināśarūpaviruddhadharmavattvātkāryakāraṇayorabhedo na yukta iti śaṅkate- janmeti /. kāraṇasya nāśābhāvāddhetvasiddhiriti pariharati- neti /. dadhighaṭādikāryānvitatvena kṣīramṛdādīnāṃ pratyakṣatvānnāśāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:499: nanu yatrānvayo dṛśyate tatra hetvasiddhāvapi yatrāṅkurādau vaṭabījādīnāmanvayo na dṛśyate tatra hetusattvādvasatvanyatvaṃ syādityata
GSP33brsgor2u:500: āha- adṛśyeti /. tatrāpyaṅkurādau bījādyavayavānāmanvayānna sta eva janmavināśau kintvavayāntaropacayāpacayābhyāṃ tadvyavahāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:501: astūpacayāpacayaliṅgena vastubhedānumānaṃ tato 'sata utpattiḥ sato nāśa
GSP33brsgor2u:502: ityāśaṅkya vyabhicāramāha- tatredṛgiti /. pitṛdehe 'pi bhedasattvānna vyabhicāra ityatra bādhakamāha- pitrādīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:504: svapakṣe doṣaṃ parihṛtya parapakṣe prasañjayati- yasya punariti /. asataḥ kāryasya kārakavyāpārāhitātiśayāśrayatvāyogādaviṣayatve 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:505: mṛdāderviṣayatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkate- samavāyīti /. samavāyikāraṇātkāryaṃ bhinnamabhinnaṃ veti vikalpādyaṃ nirasyati- netyādinā /. dvitīyamāśaṅkyeṣṭāpattimāha- samavāyīti /. kāryāṇāmavāntarakāraṇānanyatvamupasaṃharati- tasmāditi /. paramakāraṇānanyatvaṃ phalitamāha- tathā mūleti /. asatkāryavāde pratijñābādhaḥ syādityāha- yadi tu prāgutpatteriti. //18//
GSP33brsgor2u:510: 'dhikaparimāṇatvācca maśakādiva śaśaka ityatra vyabhicārārthaṃ sūtram- paṭavacceti /. dvitīyahetorvyabhicāraṃ sphuṭayati- yathā ca saṃveṣṭaneti /. āyāmo dairghyam //19//
GSP33brsgor2u:522: sa yadi tādṛgbrahmajagajjanayettarhi svāniṣṭaṃ narakādikaṃ na janayet svatantracetanatvāditi nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvoktajīvānanyatvamupajīvya jīvadoṣā brahmaṇi prasajyeranniti pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ gṛhītvā vyācaṣṭe- itaravyapadeśādityādinā /. pūrvapakṣe jīvābhinne samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:528: jīveśayorabhedājjīvajagaterdeṣā brahmaṇi syuḥ brahmagatāśca sṛṣṭisaṃhāraśaktisarvasmartṛtvādayo guṇā jīve syuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:531: vyācaṣṭe- tuśabda ityādinā /. jīveśvarayorloke bimbapratibimbayoriva kalpitabhedāṅgīkārāddharmavyavastheti siddhāntagranthārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:532: yadi vayaṃ jīvaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmastadā doṣāḥ prasajyante natu taṃ brūma ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:533: kiñcābhedājñānādūrdhvaṃ vā doṣā āpādyante, pūrvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:534: nādya ityāha- apiceti /. uktaṃ mithyājñānavijṛmbhitatvaṃ sphuṭayati- avidyeti /. kartṛtvādibuddhidharmādhyāse dehadharmādhyāsaṃ dṛṣṭāntayati- janmeti /. dvitīyaṃ pratyāha- abādhite tviti /. jñānādūrdhvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvādidharmāṇāṃ bādhāt pūrvaṃ ca kalpitabhedena vyavasthopapatterna kiñcidavadyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:538: nanvakhaṇḍaikarūpe brahmaṇi kathaṃ jīveśvaravaicitryaṃ, kathaṃ ca tatkāryavaicitryamityanupapattiṃ dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pariharati sūtrakāraḥ- aśmādivacceti /. kiṃpāko mahātālaphalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:540: sūtrasthacakārārthamāha- śruteśceti /. brahma jīvagatadoṣavat, jīvābhinnatvāt, jīvavadityādyanumānaṃ svataḥpramāṇaniravadyatvādiśrutibādhitam
GSP33brsgor2u:541: kiñca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādivikārasya mithyātvājjīvasyaiva tāvaddoṣo nāsti kuto bimbasthānīyasyāśeṣaviśeṣadarśinaḥ parameśvarasya doṣaprasaktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:542: yattu brahma na vicitrakāryaprakṛti, ekarūpātvāt, vyatirekeṇa mṛttantvādivaditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:545: tasmāt pratyagabhinne brahmaṇi samanvayasyāvirodha iti siddham //23//
GSP33brsgor2u:548: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi |
GSP33brsgor2u:549: upasaṃhāradarśanāt /. asahāyādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvan samanvayo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:550: sa kiṃ yadasahāyaṃ tanna kāraṇamiti laukikanyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvamaupādhikajīvabhedādbrahmaṇi jīvadoṣā na prasajyanta ityuktam, saṃprati upādhito 'pi vibhaktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prerakādikaṃ sahakāri nāsti īśanānātvābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣasūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe- cetanamityādinā /. phalaṃ pūrvavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:552: uktanyāyasya kṣīrādau vyabhicāra iti siddhāntayati- naiṣa doṣa iti /. śuddhasya brahmaṇo 'kāraṇatvamiṣṭameva /
GSP33brsgor2u:553: viśiṣṭasyeśvarasya tu māyaiva sahāya iti bhāvenāha- bāhyamiti /. kṣīrasyāpyātañcanādisahāyo 'stītyasahāyatvahetorna vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkya sahāyābhāve 'pi yasya kasyacitpariṇāmasya kṣīre
GSP33brsgor2u:554: darśanādvyabhicāratādavasthyamityāha- nanvityādinā /. tarhi sahāyo vyarthaḥ, tatrāha- tvāryata iti /. nanu tvāryate kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvāya śaighryaṃ kāryata iti kimarthaṃ kalpyate, svato 'śaktaṃ kṣīraṃ sahāyena śaktaṃ kriyata iti kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:555: tatrāha- yadi ceti /. śaktasya sahāyasaṃpadā kiṃ kāryamityatrāha- sādhaneti /. sahāyaviśeṣābhāve kaścidvikāraḥ kṣīrasya bhavati, tatra ātañcanaprakṣepauṣṇyābhyāṃ tūttamadadhibhāvasāmarthyaṃ vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:556: tarhi śaktivyañjako 'pi sahāyo brahmaṇo vācyaḥ, tatrāha- paripūrṇoti /. nirapekṣamāyāśaktikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:561: nanu brahma na kāraṇaṃ cetanatve satyasahāyatvānmṛdādiśūnyakulālādivaditi na kṣīrādau vyabhicāra iti sūtravyāvartyāṃ śaṅkāmāha- syadetaditi /. tasyāpi hetordevādau vyabhicāra ityāha- devādivaditi /. lokyate jñāyater'tho 'neneti loko mantrārthavādādiśāstraṃ vṛddhavyavahāraśca /
GSP33brsgor2u:564: balākāpadminīcetanayorgarbhaprasthānakartṛtve meghaśabdaḥ śarīraṃ ca sahāyo 'sti, ato viśiṣṭahetorna vyabhicāra iti śaṅkate- sa yadi brūyādityādinā /. vyabhicāro 'stīti pariharati- taṃ prati brūyāditi /. ayaṃ doṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyākhyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:565: atra hi hetau cetanatvamahandhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ cittādātmyāpannadehasādhāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu mukhyātmatvaṃ, tava kulāladṛṣṭānte sādhanavaikalyāpatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:566: asahāyatvaṃ ca cetanasya svātiriktahetuśūnyatvaṃ, tadubhayaṃ devādiṣvastīti vyabhicāraḥ, dehasya svāntaḥpātitvena svātiriktatvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:567: tathā ca kulālavailakṣaṇyaṃ devādīnāṃ ghaṭādikārye svātiriktānapekṣatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:570: śrūyate hi mahābhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:575: kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ /. kṣīradṛṣṭāntena brahma pariṇāmīti bhramotpattyā pūrvapakṣe prāpte śāstrārtho vivarto na pariṇāma iti nirṇayārthamidamadhikaraṇamiti pūrvādhikaraṇenottarādhikaraṇasya kāryatvaṃ saṃgatimāha- cetanamiti /. niravayavādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ vadan samanvayo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:576: sa kiṃ yanniravayavaṃ tanna pariṇāmīti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- kṛtsneti /. brahma pariṇāmīti vadatā vaktavyaṃ brahma niravayavaṃ sāvayavaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:577: ādye sarvasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmātmanā sthitiḥ syādityuktaṃ vyatirekadṛṣṭāntena vivṛṇoti- yadi brahmetyādinā /. paryaṇaṃsyat pariṇato 'bhaviṣyat /
GSP33brsgor2u:579: uktaśrutibhyo niravayavatvasiddheḥ phalitaṃ doṣamāha- tataśceti /. yadā pariṇāmavyatirekeṇa mūlabrahmātmā nāsti tadātmā draṣṭavya
GSP33brsgor2u:580: ityupadeśor'thaśūnyaḥ syāditi doṣāntaramāha- draṣṭavyateti /. brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmātmanā janmanāśāṅgīkāre 'ajo 'maraḥ'iti
GSP33brsgor2u:581: śrutivirodhaścetyāha- ajatvādīti /. sāvayavatvapakṣamāśaṅkya sūtraśeṣeṇa pariharati- athetyādinā. //26//
GSP33brsgor2u:585: pariṇāmapakṣo durghaṭa iti yaduktaṃ tadasmādiṣṭameveti vivartavādena
GSP33brsgor2u:586: siddhāntayati- śruteriti /. svapakṣe pūrvoktadoṣadvayaṃ nāstīti sūtrayojanayā darśayati- tuśabdenetyādinā /. īkṣitṛtvena vyākartṛtvena cekṣaṇīyavyākartavyaprapañcāt pṛthagīśvarasattvaśruterna kṛtsnaprasaktirityāha- seyaṃ devateti /. nyūnādhikabhāvenāpi pṛthaksattvaṃ śrutamityāha- tāvāniti /. itaścāstyavikṛtaṃ brahmetyāha- tatheti /. 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi'iti śruterasti dṛśyātiriktaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsgor2u:590: kṛtsnaprasaktidoṣo nāstītyuktvā dvitīyadoṣo 'pi nāstītyāha- naceti /. nanu brahma kāryātmanāpyasti, pṛthagapyasti cet sāvayavatvaṃ durvāraṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:591: niravayavasyaikasya dvidhā sattvāyogāt, ato yaddvidhābhūtaṃ tatsāvayamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:592: tarkaviruddhaṃ brahmaṇo niravayavatvamiti vivartamajānataḥ śaṅkāṃ gūḍhāśaya eva pariharati- śabdamūlaṃ ceti /. yadā laukikānāṃ pratyakṣadṛṣṭānāmapi śaktiracintyā tadā śabdaikasamadhigamyasya brahmaṇaḥ kimu vaktavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:595: prakṛtibhyaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭavastusvabhāvebhyo yatparaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ kevalopadeśagamyaṃ tadacintyasvarūpamiti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:596: āśayānavabodhena śaṅkate- nanu śabdenāpīti /. yadvā brahma pariṇāmītyekadeśināmiyaṃ siddhāntasūtravyākhyā darśitā tāmākṣipati- nanviti
GSP33brsgor2u:598: nanu brahma sāvayavaṃ niravayavaṃ veti vikalpāśrayaṇe sarvaśrutisamādhānaṃ syādityata āha- kriyeti /. niravayavatve brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaśrutivirodhaḥ, sāvayavatve
GSP33brsgor2u:599: niravayavatvaśabdavirodhaḥ, vikalpaśca vastunyayuktaḥ, ataḥ prakārāntarānupalambhācchrutīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ durghaṭamiti prāpte svāśayamuddhāṭayati- naiṣa doṣa iti /. niravayavasya vastunaḥ kūṭasthasyāpyavidyayā kalpitanāmarūpavikārāṅgīkārāddurghaṭatvadoṣo nāsti /
GSP33brsgor2u:602: kṛtsnaprasaktiṃ nirasya doṣāntaraṃ nirasyati- vācārambhaṇeti /. nanu śrutipratipādyasya pariṇāmasya kathaṃ mithyātmatvaṃ, tatrāha- na ceyamiti /. niṣprapañcabrahmādhīśeṣatvena sṛṣṭiranūdyate na pratipādyata
GSP33brsgor2u:603: ityasakṛdāveditam, ato vivartavāde na kaściddoṣa ityupasaṃharati- tasmāditi. //27//
GSP33brsgor2u:609: tatra brahmaṇo vivartopādānatvaṃ svapnasākṣidṛṣṭāntena draḍhayanmāyāvādaṃ sphuṭayati sūtrakāraḥ- ātmani ceti /. rathayogāḥ aśvāḥ //28//
GSP33brsgor2u:615: sūtrakāraḥ- svapakṣeti /. pradhānasya niravayavatve kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ sāvayavatve ca niravayavatvābhyupagamavirodha ityatra śaṅkate- nanviti /. kiṃ sāmyāvasthā guṇānāṃ vikāraḥ, samudāyo vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:618: atha niravayavā guṇā eva vividhapariṇāmānāṃ prakṛtiriti cet, tarhi kṛtsnaprasaktermūlocchedo durvāra ityabhipretya pariharati- naivamityādinā /. iti yato 'taḥsamānatvānna vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:619: pratyekaṃ sattvādikamitaraguṇadvayasacivaṃ niravayavaṃ yadyupādānaṃ tarhi kṛtsnasyopādānasya kāryarūpatvaprasaktermūloccheda ityukterniravayavatvasādhakatarkasyābhāsatvādguṇānāṃ sāvayavatvameva pariṇāmitvena mṛdādivadato na kṛtsnaprasaktirekadeśapariṇāmasaṃbhavāditi
GSP33brsgor2u:620: śaṅkate- tarketi /. etaddoṣābhāve 'pi doṣāntaraṃ syāditi pariharati- evamapīti /. nanu guṇānāmavayavāstantuvadārambhakā na bhavanti kintu kāryavaicitryānumitāstadgatāḥ śaktaya ityāśaṅkya māyikaśaktibhirbrahmaṇo
GSP33brsgor2u:621: 'pi sāvayavatvaṃ tulyamityāha- athetyādinā /. aṇuvāde 'pi doṣasāmyamāha- tatheti /. sāṃkhyavaddoṣaḥ samāna iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:627: nanu tvaṃ cora ityukte tvamapi cora itivaddoṣasāmyoktirayuktetyata āha- parihṛtastviti /. uktaṃ hi māyāvāde svapnavatsarvaṃ sāmañjasyam, ato niravayave brahmaṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:632: sarvopetā /. māyāśaktimato brahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ vadataḥ samanvayasyāśarīrasya na māyeti nyāyena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyānābhāsatvādastīti pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktaśaktimattvasamarthanādekaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatiṃ vadan siddhāntasūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:640: pūrvapakṣanyāyamanūdya dūṣayati- vikaraṇatvāditi /. devādicetanānāṃ śaktānāmapi dehabhimāne satyeva kartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadabhāve suṣupte tanna dṛṣṭaṃ, ato brahmaṇaḥ śaktatve 'pyadehatvānna kartṛtvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:644: tatra śarīrasya kalpitasya māyāśrayatvāyogānnirviśeṣacinmātrasyaiva māyādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ yuktamiti samādhānārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brsgor2u:648: na prayojanavattvāt /. parivṛptādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ vadan samanvayo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:649: sa kimabhrāntaścetano yaḥ sa niṣphalaṃ vastu na racayatīti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvamadehasyāpi śrutibalāt śaktatvoktyā kartṛtvamuktaṃ tadākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- anyathetyādinā /. īśvarasya phalābhāve 'pi paraprayojanāya sṛṣṭau pravṛttirastvityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor2u:650: śrutimāha- bhavati ceti /. yā prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ sā svaphalārtheti lokaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:652: kiñca gurutarāyāsasya phalaṃ vācyamityāha- gurutareti /. tarhyastīśvarasyāpi pravṛttiḥ svārthetyata āha- yadīyamapīti /. asvārthatve pravṛttyabhāvaḥ pūrvoktaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:653: īśvaraḥ prekṣāvānna bhavatītyāśaṅkya śrutivirodhamāha- athetyādinā /. buddheraparādho vivekābhāvaḥ //32//
GSP33brsgor2u:657: uktanyāyasya rājñāṃ līlāyāṃ vyabhicāra iti siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- tuśabdeneti /. vyatiriktaṃ /
GSP33brsgor2u:660: kadācidrājādīnāṃ līlāyā api kiñcit phalaṃ sukhollāsādikaṃ saṃbhāvyeta tathāpi niḥśvāsādau prekṣāvatpravṛttitvamasti na tu svasya tatroddeśyaṃ phalaṃ kiñcidastīti vyabhicārasthalāntaramāha- yathā ceti /. prāṇasya svabhāvaścalatvaṃ prārabdhaṃ vocchvāsādihetuḥ, īśvarasya svabhāvaḥ kālakarmasahitamāyā
GSP33brsgor2u:663: nanvīśvarastūṣṇīṃ kimiti na tiṣṭhati, kimiti svasyāphalāṃ pareṣāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:664: duḥkhāvahāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ karoti, tatrāha- naca svabhāva iti /. kāladharmādisāmāgryāṃ satyāṃ sṛṣṭeraparihāryatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:665: yaduktaṃ gurutarāyāsatvāt phalaṃ vācyamiti, tatra hetvasiddhimāha- yadyapītyādinā /. alpapravṛtterapi phalaṃ vācyaṃ loke
GSP33brsgor2u:666: tathādarśanādityāditarkasyāgamabādhamāha- yadi nāmeti /. sṛṣṭiśruterapravṛttirnāsti, sarvajñatvaśruterunmattatā nāstīti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:667: svapnasṛṣṭivadasyāḥ sṛṣṭermāyāmātratvānna phalāpekṣetyāha- na ceyamiti /. naca niṣphalasṛṣṭiśrutīnāmānarthakyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:671: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brsgor2u:672: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na /. nirdeṣādbrahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ bruvan samanvayo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:673: sa kiṃ yo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvatra līlayā yatsraṣṭṛtvamuktaṃ tadeva karmādisāpekṣasya na
GSP33brsgor2u:674: yuktamanīśvaratvāpatteḥ, nirapekṣatve rāgādidoṣāpatterityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati- punaścetyādinā /. brahmaiva jagatkāraṇamiti janmādisūtre pratijñātor'thaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:675: pṛthagjanaḥ pāmaraḥ, 'niravadyaṃ nirañjanam'iti śrutiḥ, 'na me dveṣyo 'sti
GSP33brsgor2u:679: nimittamanapekṣya viṣamakāritve vaiṣamyādidoṣaḥ syāt, na tvanapekṣatvamīśvarasyāstīti siddhāntayati- evaṃ prāpta ityādinā /. naca sāpekṣatve anīśvaratvaṃ, sevāmapekṣya phaladātari rājñīśvaratvānapāyāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:680: nanu tarhi dharmādharmābhyāmeva vicitrā sṛṣṭirastu kimīśvareṇetyata āha- īśvarastu parjanyavaditi /. sādhāraṇahetusahitasyaivāsādhāraṇahetoḥ kāryakāritvānneśvaravaiyarthyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:682: yaṃ janamunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:683: naca kañcijjanaṃ sādhu kañcidasādhu karma kārayato vaiṣamyaṃ tadavasthamiti vācyaṃ, anādipūrvārjitasādhvasādhuvāsanayā svabhāvena janasya tattatkarmasu pravṛttāvīśvarasya sādhāraṇahetutvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:688: prathamasargasya vaiṣamyahetukarmābhāvādekarūpatvaṃ syāt, tathā tathā taduttarakalpānāmapītyākṣipya samādhatte sūtrakāraḥ- na karmeti /. prathamasṛṣṭeḥ paścādbhāvikarmakṛtaṃ vaiṣamyamityāśaṅkyānyonyāśrayamāha- sṛṣṭyuttareti /. ādyā sṛṣṭirityupalakṣaṇam /
GSP33brsgor2u:689: ādāvekarūpatve madhye viṣamakarmotpattau hetvabhāvenottarasṛṣṭīnāmapi tulyatvasya durvāratvāditi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:694: prathamaḥ sargaḥ kaścinnāstītyatra pramāṇaṃ pṛcchati- kathaṃ punariti /. upapattisahataśrutyādikaṃ pramāṇamiti sūtravyākhyayā darśayati- upapadyata iti /. hetuṃ vinaiva sārgāṅgīkāre jñānakarmakāṇḍavaiyarthyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:695: nanu sukhādivaiṣamye īśvaro 'vidyā vā heturastvityāśaṅkya krameṇa
GSP33brsgor2u:696: dūṣayati- naceśvara ityādinā /. kastarhi hetuḥ, tatrāha- rāgādīti /. rāgadvaiṣamohāḥ kleśāsteṣāṃ vāsanābhirākṣiptāni karmāṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:699: kiñca sṛṣṭeḥ sāditve prathamaśarīrasyotpattirna saṃbhavati, hetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:702: saṃsārasyānāditvamaṅgīkāryamityāha- naceti /. sargapramukhe sṛṣṭyādau prāganavadhāritaprāṇo 'pi san pratyagātmā bhāvidhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdenocyatāmityatrāha- naca dhārayiṣyatīti /. 'gṛhasthaḥ sadṛśīṃ bhāryāmupeyāt'ityādāvagatyā bhāvivṛttyāśrayaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:703: asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya svarūpaṃ satyaṃ mithyā vetyupadeśaṃ vinā nopalabhyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:706: naca saṃpratiṣṭhā madhye sthitiḥ, dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpatvāditi gītāvākyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:712: sarvadharmopapatteśca /. nirguṇasya brahmaṇo jagadupādanatvavādivedāntasamanvayo viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ yannirguṇaṃ tannopādānaṃ yathā rūpamiti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe, bhavatvīśvarasya viṣamasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ tatprayojakasya karmaṇaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:714: pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntasūtratātparyamāha- cetanamiti /. vivartopādānatvaṃ nirguṇasyāpyaviruddhaṃ, ajñātatvasya bhramādhiṣṭhānatvaprayojakasya sattvāt, saguṇatvaṃ tvavyāpakaṃ śabdādiguṇeṣu nityatvādibhramadarśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:715: yadyapi sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca loke kāraṇadharmatvenāprasiddhaṃ tathāpi yo yasya kartā sa tasya sarvasya jñātā śaktaśceti prasiddham,
GSP33brsgor2u:716: īśvarasyapi sarvakartṛtvaśravaṇātprasiddhyanusāreṇārthānniratiśayasarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca sidhyatītyabhisaṃdhāyāha- sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:720: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamapādaḥ samāptaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:723: dvitīyādhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //. sāṃkhyatārkikabauddhāśca jaināḥ pāśupatādayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:724: yasya tattvaṃ na jānanti taṃ vande raghupuṅgavam //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:728: nirācaṣṭe- racanānupapatteśca nānumānam /. nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ vākyārthanirṇayapratibandhanirāsāya vedāntānāṃ tātparyaṃ niścetumidaṃ śāstramārabdhaṃ tacca nirdeṣatayā niścitaṃ, tataḥ parapakṣanirāsātmako 'yaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre na saṃgataḥ, tannirāsasya
GSP33brsgor2u:731: tarhi svapakṣasthāpanātprāgeva parapakṣapratyākhyānaṃ kāryamityata āha- vedāntārtheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:733: nanu rāgadveṣakaraṇatvāt paramatanirākaraṇaṃ na kāryamiti śaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:735: tattvanirṇayaśca paramateṣvaśraddhāṃ vinā na sidhyati, sā ca teṣu
GSP33brsgor2u:736: bhrāntimūlatvaniścayaṃ vinā na sidhyati, sa ca imaṃ pādaṃ vinā neti
GSP33brsgor2u:741: mandamatīnām teṣu śraddhānimittāni bahūni santīti tannirāsāya yatnaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:744: parapakṣatvabuddhyā hi nirāso dveṣamāvahati na tu tattavanirṇayecchayā kṛta iti mantavyam
GSP33brsgor2u:747: saṃprati śrutyanapekṣāstadīyāḥ svatantrā yuktayo nirasyanta ityarthabhedānna punaruktirityāha- taducyata.iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:748: pradhānamacetanaṃ jagadupādānamiti sāṃkhyasiddhānto 'tra viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:757: bhidyanta iti bhedā vikārāḥ, ye vikārā yenānvitāste tatprakṛtikā iti vyāptimāha- yatheti. sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakavastuprakṛtikaṃ, tadanvitatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:758: ghaṭādivadityanumānamāha- tatheti /. kimarthaṃ pradhānaṃ pariṇamate, tatrāha- cetanasyeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:759: artho bhogāpavargarūpaḥ, tadarthaṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate na tu
GSP33brsgor2u:768: tathā hi-kṣityādīnāṃ bhedānāṃ kāraṇamavyaktamasti, parimitatvāt, ghaṭavat
GSP33brsgor2u:769: na ca dṛṣṭānte sādhyavaikalyaṃ, ghaṭotpatteḥ prāganabhivyaktaghaṭādirūpakāryaviśiṣṭatvena mṛdo 'pyavyaktatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:770: tathā ghaṭādīnāṃ kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttermahadādikāryāṇāmapi kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttirvācyā, tacchaktimatkāraṇamavyaktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:771: kiñca kāraṇātkāryasya vibhāgo janma dṛśyate kṣitermṛttikā jāyate tato ghaṭa iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:772: evamavibhāgaḥ prātilomyena pralayo dṛśyate ghaṭasya mṛttikāyāṃ layaḥ tasyāḥ kṣitau kṣiterapsu apāṃ tejasīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:773: etau vibhāgāvibhāgau vaiśvarūpyasya vicitrasya bhāvajātasya dṛśyamānau pṛthakpakṣīkṛtau kvacitkāraṇe viśrāntau vibhāgatvādavibhāgatvācca mṛdi ghaṭavibhāgāvibhāgavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:779: svatantramacetanaṃ prakṛtirityetaddṛṣṭāntabalena tadā nirūpyeta yadi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kvacitsyāt
GSP33brsgor2u:782: parakīyasya sādhyasyāprasiddhimuktvā satpratipakṣaṃ vaktuṃ yadvicitraracanātmakaṃ kāryaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitācetanaprakṛtikamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:785: vipakṣe vicitraracanānupapattirūpaṃ sūtroktaṃ bādhakatarkaṃ vaktuṃ jagato
GSP33brsgor2u:787: bāhyaṃ pṛthivyādi bhogyam, ādhyātmikaṃ śarīrādi ca bhogādhiṣchānamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:789: itthaṃ vicitraṃ jagaccetanānadhiṣṭhitā jaḍaprakṛtiḥ kathaṃ racayet /
GSP33brsgor2u:797: mṛdādisvarūpatvenāntaraṅgatvāt, natu cetanādhiṣṭhitatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ, tasya mṛdādibāhyakulālādisāpekṣatvena bahiraṅgatvāt, tathā ca pariṇāmitve 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:801: tadbhinnasya bahiraṅgasyāpi vahnestadastītyantaraṅgatvaṃ vyāpakatve prayojakaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:802: kiñca yadacetanaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitameva pariṇamata ityaṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pratyuta śrutyanugrahācca tathāṅgīkāryamityāha- na caivaṃ satīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:803: sukhaduḥkhamohānvayāditi hetorasiddhidyotanārthaṃ sūtre cakāra ityāha- anvayādyanupapatteśceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:809: kiñca yadi ghaṭe mṛdvatsukhādikaṃ śabdādyanvitaṃ syāt tarhi sarvairaviśeṣeṇa sukhādikamupalabhyeta ghaṭe mṛdvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:810: na tathopalabdhirastīti yogyānupalabdhyā hetvabhāvaniścaya ityāha- śabdādīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:811: viṣayasyaikatve 'pi puruṣavāsanāvaicitryāt kasyacitsukhabuddhiḥ kasyacidduḥkhabuddhiḥ kasyacinmohabuddhirdṛśyate 'to viṣayāḥ sukhādyātmakā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:812: evaṃ samanvayāditi hetuṃ dūṣayitvā parimāṇādihetūn dūṣayati- tatheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:813: buddhyādīnāṃ parimitatvena saṃsargapūrvakatvasiddhau saṃsṛṣṭānyanekāni sattvarajastamāmasi siddhyanti, ekasmin saṃsargāsaṃbhavānna brahmasiddhiriti sāṃkhyasya bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:814: kimidaṃ parimitatvaṃ, na tāvaddeśataḥ paricchedaḥ, pakṣāntargatākāśe tasyābhāvena bhāvāsiddheḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:817: nāpi vastutaḥ paricchedaḥ, sattvādīnāṃ parasparaṃ bhinnatve satyapi sādhyābhāvena vyabhicārādityāha- sattveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:821: naca yaḥ kāryasya vibhāgaḥ sa cetanānadhiṣṭhitācetane samāpta iti vyāptirasti, sarvatrācetaneṣu cetanādhiṣṭānadarśanādityāha- kāryeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:823: yattu yatparimitaṃ tadavyaktaprakṛtipūrvakamiti vyāptyantaraṃ, tasyāpi guṇeṣvanādiṣu parimiteṣu vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:827: evaṃ cetanādhīnakāraṇaśaktitaḥ kāryapravṛttisaṃbhavāt śaktitaḥ pravṛttiliṅgamanyathāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:831: svatantramacetanaṃ kāraṇatvena nānumātavyaṃ, tasya sṛṣṭyarthaṃ- pravṛtteḥ.anupapatteriti cakāreṇānupapattipadamanuṣajya sūtraṃ yojanīyam
GSP33brsgor2u:832: racanāpravṛttyoḥ ko bheda ityāśaṅkya pravṛttisvarūpamāha- sāmyeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:833: guṇānāṃ kila sāmyāvasthā tattvānāṃ pralayaḥ, tadā na kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati pralayābhāvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsgor2u:834: kintvādau sāmyapracyutirūpaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ bhavati, tataḥ kasyacidguṇasyāṅgitvamudbhūtatvena prādhānyaṃ kasyacidaṅgatvaṃ śeṣatvamityaṅgāṅgibhāvo bhavati, tasmin sati mahadādikāryotpādanātmikā
GSP33brsgor2u:835: pravṛttiḥ, tayā vividhakāryavinyāso racaneti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:839: kecittu bhedānāṃ pravṛttiśaktimatvāccetanānadhiṣṭhatācetanaprakṛtikatvamiti śaktitaḥ pravṛttiriti liṅgaṃ vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor2u:841: kāryatvaviśeṣaṇe ca viruddhatā, pravṛttiśaktimatve sati kāryatvasya
GSP33brsgor2u:843: nanu loke svatantrācetanānāṃ pravṛtyadarśane 'pi pradhāne sā pravṛttiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:846: nanu pradhānasya pravṛttiṃ khaṇḍayatā cetanasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttirvācyā sā na yukteti sāṃkhyaḥ śaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:851: imaṃ vedāntasiddhāntaṃ sāṃkhyo dūṣayati- na tviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:855: matadvayaṃ śrutvā madhyasthaḥ pṛcchati- kiṃ. punariti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:856: yasminnacetane rathādau pravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasyaiva sā na cetanastatra heturiti kiṃ sāṃkhyamataṃ sādhu uta yena cetanenāśvādinā pravṛttistatprayuktā seti vedāntimataṃ vā sādhviti praśnārthaḥ sāṃkhya āha- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:861: jīvaddehasya rathādibhyo vailakṣaṇyaṃ prāṇādisatvaṃ liṅgaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā cetanasya siddhirityanvayaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:866: anumitasya sadbhāvamātreṇa pravṛttihetutve sarvatrākāśasyāpi hetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:867: ātmano 'pratyakṣatve cārvākāṇāṃ bhramo 'pi liṅgamityāha- ata eveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:872: pravṛttiṃ pratyāśrayatvamacetanasyaivetyuktamaṅgīkṛtya cetanasya prayojakatvaṃ siddhāntī sādhayati- tadabhidhīyata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:873: rathādipravṛttāvaśvādicetanasyānvayavyatireko sphuṭau tābhyāṃ cetanasya pravartakatvaṃ bāhyānāmapi saṃmatamityāha- laukāyatikānāmapīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:874: yaḥ pravartakaḥ saḥ svayaṃ pravṛttimānaśvādivaditi vyāpterātmani vyāpakābhāvānna pravartakatvamiti kaścicchaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:876: vastuta ekatve 'pi kalpitaṃ dvaitaṃ pravartyamastītyāha- na. /
GSP33brsgor2u:878: avidyakalpite nāmarūpaprapañce tayaivāvidyārūpayā māyayā ya āveśaścidātmanaḥ kalpitaḥ saṃbandhastasya vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ tenāntaryāmitvādikamīśvasyetyuktatvānna codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor2u:883: tatra kṣīrādau vyabhicāramāśaṅkya tasyāpi pakṣasamatvenoktānumānādāgamena ca sādhyasiddhirna vyabhicāra iti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- syādetadityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:888: kṣīre pravartakatvena dhenvādeḥ sattvācca na vyabhicāra ityāha- cetanāyāśceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:892: lokadṛṣṭyā śāstradṛṣṭyā ca sūtradvayamityavirodhamāha- upasaṃhāreti. END BsRp_2,2.1.3
GSP33brsgor2u:895: astu pradhānasyāpi dharmādi karma puruṣo vā pravartaka ityāśaṅkya sūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:897: pradhānavyatirekeṇa karmaṇo 'navasthiteḥ puruṣasyodāsīnatvāt kadācitsṛṣṭipravṛttiḥ kadācitpralaya ityayuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:903: punarapi dṛṣṭāntabalāt pradhānasya svata eva kādācitkapravṛttirityāśaṅkya niṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ- anyatretyādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:926: autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvadavyaktamiti kārikoktaṃ dūṣayati- naceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:927: autsukyamicchāviśeṣaḥ kevalajaḍasyātmano vā na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:928: asti puruṣasya dṛkśaktiścidrūpatvāt, asti ca pradhānasya
GSP33brsgor2u:929: sargaśaktistriguṇatvāt, tayoḥ śaktyordṛśyasṛṣṭī vinā sārthakyāyogāt pradhānasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttiriti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:935: puruṣasya pravartakatvaṃ nirastamapi dṛṣṭāntena punarāśaṅkya niṣedhati- puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:936: pradhānasya svātantryaṃ puruṣasyaudāsīnyaṃ cābhyupetaṃ tyajyata iti vadantaṃ sāṃkhyaṃpratyāha- kathaṃ ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:937: puruṣasya parispandaḥ prayatnaguṇo vā nāstīti vaktuṃ hetudvayam /
GSP33brsgor2u:938: pradhānapuruṣayornityatvādvyāpitvācca nityaḥ saṃnidhiḥ, aśmanastu parimārjanamṛjutvena sthāpanamanityasaṃnidhiśceti
GSP33brsgor2u:940: nanu cijjaḍayordraṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvayogyatāsti, tayā tadbhāvaḥ saṃbandha ityata
GSP33brsgor2u:943: yathā svatantrapradhānapravṛttipakṣo bhogo 'pavarga ubhayaṃ vā phalamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:944: vikalpya dūṣitaḥ, evaṃ puruṣādhīnapradhānapravṛttipakṣo 'pi phalābhāvena dūṣaṇīya ityāha- pūrvavacceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:945: siddhānte paramātmana udāsīnasya kathaṃ pravartakatvamityāśaṅkyāha- paramātmeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:953: aṅgāṅgibhāve sāmyasvarūpanāśaḥ syāt, tataḥ kauṭasthyabhaṅga iti
GSP33brsgor2u:956: cirakālasthitasya sāmyasya cyutau nimittaṃ vācyaṃ tannāstītyarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor2u:960: guṇānāṃ mitho 'napekṣasvabhāvatvānna svato vaiṣamyamityuktam, tatra hetvasiddhimāśaṅkya sūtrakāraḥ pariharati- anyatheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:961: anapekṣasvabhāvādanyathā sāpekṣatvena guṇānāmanumānātpūrvasūtrokto doṣo na prasajyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:971: tvaṅmātrameva jñānendriyamekamanekaśabdādijñānakāraṇaṃ, pañca karmendriyāṇi manaśceti saptendriyāṇi, jñānendriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:977: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham
GSP33brsgor2u:979: tapyo jīvastāpakaḥ saṃsārastayorbhedānaṅgīkārāllokaprasiddhastapyatāpakabhāvo lupyetetyarthaḥ vivṛṇoti- ekaṃ hīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:982: yathaikavahnyātmakayorauṣṇyaprakāśayoḥ, ato na vyavahāralopa ityāśaṅkya vahneriva tābhyāmātmanomokṣo na syādityāha- yadi cetyādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:983: nanu satyapi dharmiṇi svabhāvanāśo mokṣa upapadyate, satyeva jale vīcyādināśadarśanādityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntāsiddhimāha- yo 'pīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:984: kiñca bhedāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ, anaṅgīkāre lekaprasiddhibādha ityāha- prasiddhaśceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:985: artho hyarjanālābhādinārthinaṃ tāpayatīti tāpakaḥ, arthī tapyastayorabhede bādhakamāha- yadīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:989: arthatvaṃ hi kāmanāviṣayatvaṃ, tacca kāmyādanyasya kāmayiturasatvānna syāt
GSP33brsgor2u:990: na hi svasya svārthatvamasti kāmyasyaiva kāmayitṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:996: advaitamate mukterayogamuktvā svamate yogamāha- jātyantareti /. tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:997: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brsgor2u:1006: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃ na. paśyasīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1008: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ, kiṃvā dehasaṃhatasya, uta tapteḥ, āhosvit sattvasya /
GSP33brsgor2u:1015: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha- paramārthata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1016: ivaśabdamātreṇa kathaṃ mithyā taptyavagama iti cettaducyate-ivaśabdastapyabuddhisattvasādṛśyaṃ brūte, tacca sādṛśyaṃ puruṣasya tapyatvarūpaṃ cet kalpitameva
GSP33brsgor2u:1019: mithyāsādṛśyameva doṣa iti cet, netyāha- nahīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1020: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1021: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1022: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ, kauṭasthyahānāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1026: sattvaṃ puruṣo vā tapyaśaktiḥ, tāpakaśaktistu rajaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1027: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1029: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati- neti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1030: tamaso nivṛttyabhāve 'pivivekenoparamānmokṣa ityata āha- guṇānāṃ ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1035: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brsgor2u:1041: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde saṃgatatvāt tathāpi pūrvatra pradhānaguṇānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ jagatyananvayātpradhānasyānupādānatvamuktaṃ, tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1043: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna tadvirodha iti siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- eṣetyādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1044: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1045: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati, tena
GSP33brsgor2u:1047: iti sāmānyena prakriyāmuktvā viśeṣatastāmāha- yadā dvāviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1048: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ, tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyamityucyate, tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti
GSP33brsgor2u:1051: dve dve iti śabdadvayaṃ paṭhitavyam, evaṃ sati caturbhirdvyaṇukaiścaturaṇukārambha upapadyate, yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1052: dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate, kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1053: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1055: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā brūte- yadāpi bahava iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1056: kārakaguṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ samānajātīyaguṇārambhakāḥ, kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1057: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha- tadevamiti /. paramāṇubhya eva mahaddīrghaṃ cetyaniyataprakriyāmāśrityoktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1059: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti
GSP33brsgor2u:1062: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1063: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1065: acetanaiva virodhiguṇa ityata āha- na hyacetaneti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1068: utpannaṃ hi parimāṇāntaraṃ virodhi bhavati, tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1069: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha- ārabdhamapīti. sahotpattāvapasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1071: aṇutvādyārambhe vyagratvāt pārimāṇḍalyādeḥ svasamānaguṇānārambhakatvamityāśaṅkya niṣedhati- naceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1075: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ, dvitūlapiṇḍārabdhe
GSP33brsgor2u:1085: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha- tasmāditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1086: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteścaitanyasya viśeṣaguṇatvādārambhakatvaṃ durvāramiti, tanmandaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1090: nanu cetanaṃ brahma kāryopādānatvāddravyaṃ, tanna vilakṣaṇasyopādānamiti prakṛte kiñciddravyameva vilakṣaṇakāryakaramudāhartavyam, na saṃyogasya guṇasyodāharaṇamiti śaṅkate- dravya iti. guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1103: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve 'pi paramāṇūnāṃ tadadhiṣṭhitānāṃ kāraṇatvamastviti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyā sāṃkhyādhikaraṇānantaryamasya
GSP33brsgor2u:1107: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati- sa ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1108: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1113: nanvetāvatā kathaṃ paramāṇusiddhiḥ, tatrāha- sa cāyamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1114: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1116: jagannityatvavādāt kāryadravyatvahetvasiddhiriti vadantaṃ pratyāha- sarvaṃ ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1120: pralaye caiṣāmapi nāśānna jagatkāraṇatvamityāśaṅkyāha- teṣāṃ ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1123: teṣāṃ nityatve phalitaṃ sṛṣṭikramamāha- tata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1124: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam
GSP33brsgor2u:1126: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ, karmaṇaśca nimittaṃ prayatnādikaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā
GSP33brsgor2u:1130: dvitīye karmānutpattiḥ nādyaḥ, prayatnādeḥ sṛṣṭyuttarakālīnatvādityubhayathāpi na karma saṃbhavati
GSP33brsgor2u:1132: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1135: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1143: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi
GSP33brsgor2u:1146: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti, astitve 'pi sadā sattvānna niyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1148: saṃyogasya hetutvaṃ khaṇḍayitvā svarūpaṃ khaṇḍayati- saṃyogaścāṇoriti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1149: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1150: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha- dṛṣṭeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1153: notpadyeta, utpannaṃ vā mithyā syādityapasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1154: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1156: paramāṇūnāṃ karmaṇā saṃyogātsargaḥ, vibhāgātpralaya iti prakriyā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:1157: yugapadanantaparamāṇūnāṃ vibhāge niyatasyābhighātāderdṛṣṭasya nimittasyāsattvāt dharmādharmarūpādṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhārthatvena sukhaduḥkaśūnyapralayaprayojakatvāyogānnādṛṣṭanimittena karmaṇā vibhāgaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:1158: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti, ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā END BsRp_2,2.3.12
GSP33brsgor2u:1162: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1163: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na
GSP33brsgor2u:1165: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati- neti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1168: guṇatvābhāve 'pi karmasāmānyādīnāṃ samavāyāṅgīkārādguṇatvaṃ samavāyitve na vyāpakam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1170: tasmāt saṃbandhibhinnatvameva saṃbandhāntarāpekṣāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ, tasya samavāye 'pi tulyatvādanavasthā durvārā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1177: anubhavasvabhāvatve naimittikī pravṛttirvācyā, nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1178: nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, tasyānimittatve pravṛttyabhāva ityarthaḥ //14//
GSP33brsgor2u:1182: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brsgor2u:1183: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha- sāvayavānāmityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1184: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:1188: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ, yatra
GSP33brsgor2u:1189: sparśastatkāraṇaṃ, yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1191: ātmavaditi satpratipakṣamutthāpya viśeṣyāsiddhyā dūṣayati- yacca nityatva iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1193: nityatvapratiṣedhaḥ sapratiyogikaḥ, abhāvatvāt, ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati, anyathā pratiyogyabhāve pratiṣedhānupapatteriti kaṇādoktamanūdyānyathāsiddhyā dūṣayati- yadapīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1195: vastutastu viśeṣavyavahāra evāsiddhaḥ, kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha- naca śabdeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1196: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:1197: tato mūlajñānātprāgvyavahāramātrānna vastusiddhiḥ, vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva aśeṣasiddhervyavahāropanyāsavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1198: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati- yadapīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1199: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ, tarhyapratyakṣakāraṇatvaṃ nityatve hetuḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1203: paramāṇavo nityāḥ, nāśakānupalambhāt, ātmavaditi sūtrārthamāśaṅkate- athāpīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1204: tantvādyavayavānāṃ vibhāgānnāśādvā paṭhādināśo dṛṣṭaḥ, tacca dvayaṃ niravayavāṇūnāṃ nāstīti nityatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1206: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt, tadā dravyavināśo dvābhyāmevetiniyamaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1208: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1209: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:1214: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1215: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ, ghṛtasya pariṇāmina ekatvena vibhāgāsaṃbhavāt, paramāṇukāṭhinyanāśe tadasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1216: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1222: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā
GSP33brsgor2u:1228: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1237: guṇāśrayatvādyupādhayo vā, nirguṇatve sati jātimadakriyatvaṃ guṇalakṣaṇam,
GSP33brsgor2u:1239: sāmānyam, nityadravyavṛttayo viśeṣāḥ, nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brsgor2u:1246: guṇādiṣu tadadhīnatvaṃ tāvadanvayavyatirekasiddhaṃ, tathā ca guṇādayo
GSP33brsgor2u:1247: dravyābhinnāḥ, dravyādhīnatvāt, yadyasmādbhinnaṃ tanna tadadhīnaṃ, yathā śaśabhinnaḥ kuśa ityarthaḥ /
