GSP33brsgor2u:1248: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ, tatrāha- dravyamiti. kalpitabhedo 'pyastītyāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1250: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha- tathā
GSP33brsgor2u:1254: yadyapi tadadhīnatvaṃ taddharmatvaṃ, tacca dhūme nāsti, agniṃ vināpi bhāvāt, tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1256: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1261: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati- apṛthagdeśatva. iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1263: svabhāvo hi svarūpaṃ tasyāpṛthaktve 'smadiṣṭābhedasiddhirityāha- apṛthaktvabhāvatva iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1265: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1271: 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate- siddhaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1273: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1274: sadyojātapaṭasya kriyābhāvāt kathaṃ saṃyogaḥ, tatrāha- yatheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1279: kalpitabhedasādhane siddhasādhanatā, vastubhedasādhane tu vyabhicāra iti
GSP33brsgor2u:1282: svarūpeṇaiva manuṣyādiśabdabhāgeva putrādyapekṣayā pitetyādivilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyo bhavati, naca bhidyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1284: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1287: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati- nāpīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1288: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1305: nanu dvyaṇukasyāsamavetatve tadāśritatvaṃ na syāt, saṃbandhaṃ vinā tadayogāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1306: naca saṃyogādāśritatvaṃ kāryadravyasya prakṛtyasaṃyogāditi śaṅkate- kāryeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1309: kathaṃ tarhi kāryasya kāraṇāśritatvavyavahāraḥ kalpitabhedādityāha- kāraṇasyaiveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1310: paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvamapyayuktamityāha- kiñceti /. paramāṇavaḥ sāvayavāḥ, alpatvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:1312: nanuparamāṇvapekṣayā yo 'yaṃ prācī dakṣiṇetyādidigbhedavyavahārastadavadhitvena ye 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati- yāṃstvamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1315: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt, tadanyasyālpasya digvibhāgārhatvenāvayavavibhāgāvaśyaṃ bhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1316: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ, vināśitvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:1317: naca hetvasiddhiḥ, aṇavo vināśinaḥ, pṛthivyādijātīyatvāt, ghaṭavaditi sādhanāditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:1318: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati- vinaśyanta ityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1320: nimittādṛṣṭādināśādvināśaḥ pralaye saṃbhavati, muktau jñānādajñānanāśe tatkāryāṇunāśasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1324: kāryadravyasthitāvapi hetvātsaṃyogasya kṣīrāraṃbhakasaṃyogāddadhyārambhakaṃ na saṃyogāntaraṃ, tathā ca dadhyādau
GSP33brsgor2u:1326: kiñca yatkāryadravyaṃ taddravyārambhamityeva vyāptirastu lāghavāt, na tu saṃyogasacivasvanyūnaparimāṇenekadravyārambhamiti,
GSP33brsgor2u:1333: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam, pṛthivītvādinā sāvayavatvānityatvayoranumānāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1344: vaiśeṣikaṃ nirasya vaināśikaṃ nirasyati- samudāya iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1345: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha- vaiśeṣiketi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1346: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate- sa ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1347: nanu sugataproktāgamasyaikyāt kuto bahuprakāratā, tatrāha- pratipattīti. ekasyaivāgamavyākhyātuḥ śiṣyasyāvasthābhedena vuddhibhedāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:1350: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1351: teṣvādyayorbāhyārthānāṃ parokṣatvāparokṣatvavivāde 'pyastitvasaṃpratipattestayoḥ siddhāntamekīkṛtya nirasyata ityāha- tatra ye sarvāstitveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1352: bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ bāhyaṃ, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyāntaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1353: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1354: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati- tatra
GSP33brsgor2u:1356: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ, siddhānte tadavirodha iti jñeyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1357: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn vibhajate- catuṣṭaye ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1359: kharaḥ kaṭhinastatsvabhāvāḥ pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, snigdhā āpyāḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1364: vijñānaskandhaḥ, sukhādyanubhavo vedanāskandhaḥ, gauraśva ityevaṃ nāmaviśiṣṭasavikalpakapratyayaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ, rāgadveṣamohadharmādharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1369: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte
GSP33brsgor2u:1371: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:1373: nāpi cittākhyamabhijvalanaṃ vijñānaṃ samudāyahetuḥ, saṃghāte dehākāre jāte
GSP33brsgor2u:1375: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet
GSP33brsgor2u:1376: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam, anirmokṣaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1378: āśerate 'smin rāgādaya ityāśayaḥ saṃtānaḥ, sa kiṃ saṃtānibhyo 'nyo
GSP33brsgor2u:1383: kṣaṇikasya janmātiriktavyāpāro nāsti, tasmāttasya paramāṇvādimelanārthaṃ pravṛttiranupapannā
GSP33brsgor2u:1385: etenānanyaḥ saṃtāna iti pakṣo nirastaḥ, kṣaṇikasya melakatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1394: kṣaṇikeṣu sthiratvabuddhiravidyā, tato rāgadveṣamohāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti,
GSP33brsgor2u:1395: tebhyo garbhasthasyādyaṃ vijñānamutpadyate, tasmāccālayavijñānāt pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ nāmāśrayatvānnāma bhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:1398: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ, nāmarūpendriyāṇāṃ mithaḥ saṃyogaḥ sparśaḥ, tataḥ sukhādikā vedanā, tayā punarviṣayatṛṣṇā, tayā pravṛttirūpādānaṃ, tena bhavatyasmājjanmeti bhavo dharmādiḥ, tato jātirdehajanma pañcaskandhasamudāya iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:1399: jātānāṃ skandhānāṃ paripāko jarāskandhaḥ, maraṇaṃ nāśaḥ, mriyamāṇasya putrādisnehādantardāhaḥ śokaḥ, tena hā putretyādivilāpaḥ paridevanā,
GSP33brsgor2u:1400: aniṣṭānubhavo duḥkhaṃ, tenaṃ durmanastā mānasī vyathā, itiśabdo mānāpamānādikleśasaṃgrahārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1401: na kevalaṃ sugatānāmevāvidyādayaḥ saṃmatāḥ, kintu sarvavādināmapītyāha- sarveṣāmiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1402: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:1405: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1406: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ, tannāstītyāha- atrocyate, yadīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1409: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa saṃhatikartṛtvāyogātsaṃghātāpatternimittaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ tadā kṣaṇikapakṣe tannāstīti kimu vaktavyamityāha- kimiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1414: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na
GSP33brsgor2u:1415: saṃhantāramapekṣate, pūrvasaṃghātāśrayā avidyādaya uttarasaṃghātapravartakā iti nānyonyāśrayadoṣo 'pītyāśaṅkate- atha manyasa iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1418: kiñca bhoktuḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe bhogāpavargavyavahāro 'pi durghaṭa ityāha- api ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1419: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā, asti cet kṣaṇikatvabhaṅga
GSP33brsgor2u:1425: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1432: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya
GSP33brsgor2u:1435: kiṃ hetorutpattyatiriktaḥ kāryotpādanākhyo vyāpāraḥ, anatirikto vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1438: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1439: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1440: naṣṭasyāpi nimittattvaṃ syānvopādānatvaṃ, tathā ca mṛdāderghaṭādikālāsattve ghaṭādyanutpattiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1443: vastuno janmadhvaṃsānirūpāṇācca na kṣaṇikatvamityāha- api ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1450: saṃsarga eva nāstīti tṛtīyakalpamutthāpya dūṣayati- athātyanteti. //20//
GSP33brsgor2u:1457: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1462: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe- athottarakṣaṇetyādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1470: saṃprati tadabhimataṃ dvividhaṃ vināśaṃ dūṣayati- pratisaṃkhyeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1475: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1481: saṃtāno nāma bhāvānāṃ hetuphalabhāvena pravāhaḥ, tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1483: dvitīye caramasyāsattvaprasaṃgaḥ, arthakriyākāritvaṃ sattvamiti svasiddhāntāt, caramasyāsattve
GSP33brsgor2u:1488: bījasyāṅkurādiṣu pratyabhijñānādarśanādanvayino viccheda ityata āha- aspaṣṭeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1504: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha- vipratipannāniti
GSP33brsgor2u:1505: śabdo vastuniṣṭhaḥ guṇatvāt, gandhādivadityanumānādākāśasya vastutvaṃ sidhyati /
GSP33brsgor2u:1507: ākāśasya bhāvatvaṃ prasādhyābhāvatvaṃ dūṣayati- api ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1515: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1525: kṣaṇikatve jñānadvayānusaṃdhānaṃ ca na syādityāha- kathaṃ hyahamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1528: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1532: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha- yatraivamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:1533: pratyayamāha- smarāmīti /. smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko
GSP33brsgor2u:1535: prakṛtapratyabhijñāyāṃ tādṛśabhedapratyayasya bādhakasyādarśanādātmasthāyitvaṃ durvāramityāha- iha tvahamada iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1536: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:1537: tathā draṣṭṛsmartroraikye sati sthāyitvaṃ phalitamityāha- tatraivaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1541: vartamānadaśāmārabhyottamāducchvāsādāmaraṇādanantarāmanantarāṃ svasyaiva pratipattimātmaikakartṛkāṃ pratyabhijānannā janmanaścāvartamānadaśāparyantamatītāḥ pratipattīḥ svakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ.sanniti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1542: dīpajvālāsvivātmani pratyabhijñānaṃ sādṛśyadoṣāditi śaṅkate- sa iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1543: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati, sattve vāpasiddhāntaḥ syāditi pariharati- tamityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1546: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1547: kṣaṇāntarāsparśī, ato na sthiradraṣṭrapekṣeti śaṅkate- tenedamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1548: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1553: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:1556: iṣṭāpattiriti bruvāṇaṃ vijñānavādinaṃ pratyāha- yadā hīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1557: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena, tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikavijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatvādekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekapakṣasphuraṇātmakavipratipattyasaṃbhavāt svapakṣasādhanādivyavahāro lupyeta, ato yathānubhavaṃ jñānajñeyabhedo
GSP33brsgor2u:1559: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1562: ato vipratipattyādivyavahāra iti bāhyārthavādamāśaṅkya nirasyati- evameveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1565: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam, tasya vartamānatvamātragocaratvena kālāntarāsattvāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1566: naca yatsat tatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptirasti, vidyudāderapi dvitrikṣaṇasthāyitvena dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1569: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1576: so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyā bhramatvaṃ nirasya saṃśayatvaṃ nirasyati- bhavediti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1583: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti, taddūṣayati- nāsata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1584: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:1590: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe
GSP33brsgor2u:1598: yadi bījābhāvasyābhāvāntarādviśeṣaḥ syāt, tadā viśeṣavadabhāvadvārā bījādevāṅkura iti laukāyatikānāmabhyupagamor'thavānsyāt, na so 'stītyāha- yeneti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1605: abhāvo na prakṛtiḥ, kāryānanvitatvāt, yathā śarāvādyananvitastanturna śarāvādiprakṛtiriti tarkapūrvakamāha- abhāvācceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1609: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ, yato 'śaktasyāpi
GSP33brsgor2u:1613: na cātiśayasyātiśayāntarānapekṣatve kāryasyāpyanapekṣeti vācyaṃ, paṭasya mṛdanapekṣatve kāryatvāviśeṣādghaṭasyāpi
GSP33brsgor2u:1618: na hyarthakriyākāritvameva sattvam, asatastadayogena sattvasya tato bhedāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1631: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brsgor2u:1636: akhaṇḍanirviśeṣaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ bāhyārthopādānaṃ vadatāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhinnaṃ sākāraṃ kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānaṃ na tato 'nyor'tho 'stīti yogācāramatena virudhyate na veti tanmatasya mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvoktabāhyārthavādanirāsamupajīvya pūrvapakṣamāha- evamityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1638: nanvekasya sugatāgamasya kathaṃ bāhyārthasattvāsattvayostātparyaṃ virodhādityāśaṅkyādhikāribhedādavirodha iti vadan vijñānavādinaḥ sugatābhiprāyajñatvena mandādhikāribhyo bāhyārthavādibhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyamāha- keṣāñciditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1641: nanvasati bāhyārthe mānameyavyavahāraḥ kathaṃ, tatrāha- tasminniti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1643: śaktyātmanā mānaṃ, śaktyāśrayatvākāreṇa pramāteti bhedakalpanayā vyavahāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1644: mukhya eva bhedaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha- satyapīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1646: ato buddhyārūḍhākāra eva prameyaṃ na bāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1652: avayavyabhāve 'pi jātyādayo bāhyārthāḥ syuḥ, tatrāha- evamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1653: jātiguṇakarmaṇāṃ dharmiṇaḥ sakāśādabhede 'tyantabhede vā dharmivaddharmyantaravacca na dharmadharmibhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1654: bhedābhedau ca viruddhāviti na santi jātyādyarthā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1655: kiñca jñānasya jñeyasārūpyarūpaviśeṣasaṃbandhābhāve sarvaviṣayatvāpatterviśeṣo 'ṅgīkāryaḥ, tathāca jñānagataviśeṣasyaiva jñānena viṣayīkaraṇānna bāhyārthasiddhirmānābhāvādgauravāccetyāha- apiceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1667: 'pi nīlādyākārajñānavaicitryaṃ bhavati, yathā bījavāsanayā kārpāsaraktatvaṃ tadvadityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1668: ubhayavādisaṃmatatvācca vāsanā eva jñānavaicitryahetavo na bāhyārthā
GSP33brsgor2u:1670: kṣaṇikavijñānamātravādasya mānamūlatvāttena nityavijñānavādo virudhyata iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- nābhāva ityādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1675: tvadvacanādapi jano bāhyārthaṃ jñānādbhedenaivopalabhata ityāha- ataśceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1676: bāhyārthasyātyantāsattve pratyakṣopalambhāyogāt, dṛṣṭāntatvātsaṃbhavācca bahirvacchabdo na syādityāha- itaratheti /. abādhitabhedānubhavādevakāro yukto na vatkāra ityāha- tasmāditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1678: ko 'sāvasaṃbhavaḥ, asattvaṃ vā asattvaniścayo vā ayuktatvaṃ vā
GSP33brsgor2u:1686: vyavasthāmeva sphuṭayati- yaddhīti /. uktavyavasthāyāḥ phalaṃ bāhyārthasya pratyakṣādibhiḥ saṃbhavaṃ vadanneva tṛtīyaṃ dūṣayati- iheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1687: pramāṇaniścitabāhyārthasya stambhādeḥ paramāṇubhyo bhedābhedavikalpairayuktatvamātreṇāsattvaniścayo na yuktaḥ, tvatpakṣe
GSP33brsgor2u:1689: na hyasthūlasyaikasya vijñānasya sthūlānekasamūhālambanasya viṣayābhedo yuktaḥ, sthūlatvānekaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1690: na ceṣṭāpattiḥ, samūhālambanocchede vijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatayā viṣayadvitvādivyavahāralopāpatteḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1694: yaccoktaṃ jñānagatārthasārūpyasyaiva jñānālambanatvopapatterbahirarthābhāva iti, tatrāha- naceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1695: yattu gauravamuktaṃ, tanna dūṣaṇaṃ, prāmāṇikatvādityāha- vahiriti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1696: yata eva jñānārthayorbhedaḥ sarvaloke sākṣyanubhavasiddhaḥ, ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi nābhedasādhaka ityāha- ata eveti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1698: nālokābhedaḥ, tathārthasya na jñānābhedaḥ, bhede 'pi grāhyagrāhakabhāvena niyamepapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1699: naca jñānasya kṣaṇikatvāt svabhinnagrāhyasaṃbandhāyogaḥ, sthāyitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1700: vijñānamanekārthebhyo bhinnam, ekatvāt, gotvavaditi satpratipakṣamāha- api ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1705: jñānabhinnārthānaṅgīkāre svaśāstravyavahāralopaṃ bādhakamāha- api ceti. kramikayoḥ svaprakāśayoḥ kṣaṇikajñānayormitho grāhyagrāhakatvamayuktamanabhyupagataṃ ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:1706: tathā ca tayorbhedapratijñā na yuktā, dharmipratiyoginormithaḥ pareṇa cāgraheṇa bhedagrahāyogāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1708: evaṃ pakṣasādhyahetudṛṣṭāntabhedābhāve idaṃ kṣaṇikamasaditi pratijñā na yuktā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1709: sarvato vyāvṛttaṃ vyaktimātratvaṃ svalakṣaṇam, anekānugataṃ sāmānyamatadvyāvṛttirūpamiti pratijñā na yuktā, sarvānekārthānāṃ jñānamātratve mithaḥ pareṇavā durjñānatvāt uttaranīlajñānaṃ vāsyaṃ pūrvanīlajñānaṃ vāsakamiti pratijñā na yuktā, tayorbhinnasya jñāturabhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1711: naraviṣāṇamityasaddharmaḥ, amūrtamiti sadasaddharmaḥ, sato vijñānasyāsato naraviṣāṇasya vāmūrtatvādipratijñā durlabhā, anekārthajñānasādhyatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1712: ajñānenāsya bandho jñānenāsya mokṣa iti ca pratijñā bahvarthajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1713: ādipadena sāmānyata iṣṭaṃ grāhyamaniṣṭaṃ tyājyamiti śiṣyahitepadeśo
GSP33brsgor2u:1718: svaviṣayatvādvijñānaṃ svīkriyate nārthaḥ paragrāhyatvāditi śaṅkate- atha
GSP33brsgor2u:1720: viruddhaṃ svīkṛtyāviruddhaṃ tyajatā bauddhatanayena mauḍhyaṃ darśitamityāha- atyanteti. jñānaṃ svavedyamityaṅgīkṛtya maurkhyamāpāditaṃ, vastutaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1723: naca svaviṣayatvamātraṃ svavedyatvamiti vācyam, abhede viṣayaviṣayitvasyāpyasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1724: jñānasya svavedyatvābhāve doṣadvayaṃ syāditi śaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1725: anavasthā ca sāmyaṃ ceti doṣadvayaṃ pariharati- tadubhayamapīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1726: anityajñānasya janmādimatvena ghaṭavajjaḍasya svena svīyajanmādigrahāyogādasti grāhakākāṅkṣā, sākṣiṇastu sattāyāṃ sphūrtau ca nirapekṣatvānnānavasthā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1733: vijñānaṃ jñānāntarāpekṣamiti bruvatā tasyāprāmāṇikatvamuktaṃ syāt, svayaṃ prathata iti bruvatā jñātṛśūnyatvaṃ coktā syāt, tathāca jñātṛjñānāviṣayatvācchilāsthapradīpavadasadeva vijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1735: vijñānasya svānyajñātṛśūnyatvamiṣṭameva tvayāpādyate na cāsattvāpattiḥ jñātrabhāvāditi vācyaṃ, svasyaiva jñātṛtvāditi śākyaḥ śaṅkate- bāḍhamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1740: dvitīye vijñānavāda eva bhaṅgyantareṇoktaḥ syāditiśaṅkate- sākṣiṇa iti. tvayā vijñānaṃ janmavināśayuktamucyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:1742: kūṭasthacidātmano grāhakānapekṣatvānnānavastheti coktamato mahadvailakṣaṇyamāvayoreti pariharati- na. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1750: kimatra nirviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamuta pāramārthikaviṣayaśūnyatvam, athavā vyāvahārikaviṣayaśūnyatvam
GSP33brsgor2u:1759: kiñca pramāṇajānubhava upalabdhiḥ pakṣo 'pramāṇajaṃ svapnajñānaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti vaidharmyāntaram
GSP33brsgor2u:1762: asaṃbandhaścāvartamānaśca smṛterartho viṣaya iti nirālambanatvamapyasyāḥ kadācidbhavet, na saṃprayuktavaryamānārtamātragrāhiṇyā upalabdheriti
GSP33brsgor2u:1769: vastuto ghaṭādyanubhavasya nirālambanatvaṃ dharmo di syāttadā kiṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1772: yadi na vastuto dharmo 'sti tadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena, bādhitasya dṛṣṭāntasahasreṇāpi duḥsādhyatvāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1773: ataḥ svato nirālambanatvoktau sālambanatvānubhavabādhabhiyā tvayānumātumārabdhaṃ tathāpi bādho na muñcatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1774: uktopādhirapi na vismartavya ityāha- darśitaṃ tviti. //29//
GSP33brsgor2u:1781: bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa ityadṛṣṭe 'pi tajjātīyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvakalpanā yuktā, iha tvarthānubhavanirapekṣavāsanotpatterādāveva kalpyatvādanāditvakalpanā nirmūleti nābhipretadhīvaicitryasiddhirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1782: nanu nirapekṣavāsanānāṃ sattve dhīvaicitryamasattve tu neti svapne dṛṣṭamiti samūlānavasthetyata āha- yāviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1786: abhinavārthopalabdhivaicitryasya vāsanāṃ vināpi bhāvena vyatirekavyabhicārācca na kvāpi vāsanāmātrakṛtaṃ dhīvaicitryaṃ kintvarthānubhave sati vāsanāsati netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vāsanāmūlānubhavāvacchedakārthakṛtameveti bāhyārthasadbhāvasiddhirityāha- apiceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1787: yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa sāśrayo loke dṛṣṭaḥ yathā vegādiriṣvādyāśrayaḥ, ato vijñānasaṃskārāṇāṃ na bhāva āśrayānupalabdherityarthāntaramāha- apiceti. END BsRp_2,2.5.30
GSP33brsgor2u:1792: sahotpannayoḥ savyetaraviṣāṇavadāśrayāśrayibhāvāyogāt, paurvāparye cādheyakṣaṇe 'sata ādhāratvāyogāt, sattve kṣaṇikatvavyāghātānnādhāratvamālayavijñānasya kṣaṇikatvānnīlādivijñānavadityarthaḥ astu tarhyālayavijñānasaṃtānāśrayā vāsanetyata āha- nahīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1793: savikāraḥ kūṭastho vā sthāyyātmā yadi nāsti tadā saṃtānasyāvastutvāddeśādyapekṣayā yadvāsanānāmādhānaṃ nikṣepo ye ca smṛtipratyabhijñe yaśca tanmūlo vyavahāraḥ, tatsarvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ yadi vyavahārārthamātmasthāyitvaṃ tadāpasiddhānta ityāha- sthireti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1796: jñānajñeyātmakasya sarvasya sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvācchūnyatāvaśiṣyata iti mādhyamikapakṣasyāpi mānamūlatvamāśaṅkaya sūtrakāraḥ kimiti na nirācakāretyata āha- śūnyeti. ādaraḥ pṛthaksūtrārambho na kriyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:1804: kiñca niradhiṣṭhānaniṣedhāyogādadhiṣṭhānameva tattvaṃ vācyaṃ, tasya tvante na bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1817: sarvajñasya kathaṃ viruddhapralāpaḥ, tatrāha- pradveṣo veti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1819: ato bhrāntyekamūlasugatasiddhāntena vedāntasiddhāntasya na virodha iti siddham //32//
GSP33brsgor2u:1824: muktakacchamate niraste muktāmbarāṇāṃ mataṃ buddhisthaṃ bhavati tannirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṅgatimāha- nirasta iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1825: ekarūpaṃ brahmeti vaidikasiddhāntasyānaikāntavādena virodho 'sti na veti tadvādasya mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe mānamūlatvādvirodha iti pūrvapakṣaphalamabhisaṃdhāyatanmatamupanyasyati- sapta ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1826: jīvājīvau bhoktṛbhogyau, viṣayābhimukhyenendriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirāśravaḥ, tāṃ saṃvṛṇoti iti saṃvaro yamaniyamādiḥ, nirjarayati nāśayati kalmaṣamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:1827: nirjarastaptaśilārohaṇādiḥ, bandhaḥ karma, mokṣaḥ karmapāśanāśe satyalokākāśapraviṣṭasya satatordhvagamanam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1829: saṃkṣepavistarābhyāmuktārtheṣu madhyamarītyā vistarāntaramāha- tayoriti. astikāyaśabdaḥ sāṃketikaḥ padārthavācī /
GSP33brsgor2u:1831: pūryante glantīti pudgalāḥ paramāṇusaṃghāḥ kāyāḥ, samyakpravṛttyanumeyo
GSP33brsgor2u:1837: pudgalāstikāyaḥ ṣoḍhā-pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni, sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1839: ākāśāstikāyo dvividhaḥ-lokākāśaḥ sāṃsārikaḥ, alokākāśo muktāśraya iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1841: tatra jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ mohanīyamantarāyaṃ ceti ghātikarmāṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:1842: tattvajñānānna muktiriti jñānamādyaṃ karma, ārhatatantraśravaṇānna muktiriti jñānam dvitīyaṃ, bahuṣu tīrthakarapradarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu
GSP33brsgor2u:1845: athāghātīni catvāri karmāṇi vedanīyaṃ nāmikaṃ gotrikamāyuṣkamiti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1847: nāmikam, ahamatra bhavato deśikasyārhataḥ śiṣyavaṃśe praviṣṭo 'smītyabhimāno gotrikam, śarīrasthityarthaṃ karma āyuṣkam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1854: iyaṃ prakriyā mānyaśūnyeti dyotayati- svasamayaparikalpitāniti /. svīyatantrasaṃketamātrakalpitānityarthaḥ padārthānāmuktānāmanaikāntatvaṃ vadantītyāha- sarvatreti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1856: saptānāmastitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī, tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1857: ghaṭāderhi sarvātmanā sadaikarūpatve prāpyātmanāpyastyeva sa iti tatprāptaye yatno na syāt
GSP33brsgor2u:1858: ato ghaṭatvādirūpeṇa kathañcidasti, prāpyatvādirūpeṇa kathañcinnāstītyevamanekarūpatvaṃ vastumātrasyāstheyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1866: krameṇobhayavāñchāyāṃ syādasti ca nāsti ceti tṛtīyo bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1867: yugapadubhayavāñchāyāmasti nāstīti śabdadvayasya sakṛdvakttumaśakyatvāt syādavaktavya iti caturtho bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1870: tṛtīyacaturthecchāyāṃ syādasti cāvaktavyaśceti saptamo bhaṅga iti vibhāgaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1874: evamanekarūpatve vastuni prāptityāgādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati, ekarūpatve sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadāstyeveti vyavahāravilopāpattiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:1877: yadasti tat sarvatra sarvadāstyeva yathā brahmātmā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1878: na caivaṃ tatprāptaye yatno na syāditi vācyam, aprāptibhrāntyā yatnasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1883: nahi dūrasthagrāmasya prāpterasattve grāmo 'pyasan bhavati, prāpyāsattve prāptiyatnānupapatteḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1889: kiñca jīvādipadārthānāṃ saptatvaṃ jīvatvādirūpaṃ cāstyeva nāstyeveti ca niyatamutāniyatam
GSP33brsgor2u:1892: anaikāntaṃ sarvamityeva niścaya iti śaṅkate- nanviti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1895: dvitīye tasya saṃśayatvaṃ syādityāha- neti brūma iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1898: ityevaṃ sarvatrānirdhāraṇe satyupadeśo niṣkampapravṛttiśca na syādityāha- evaṃsatīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1899: anaikāntavāde astikāyapañcatvamapi na syādityāha- tathā pañcānāmiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1900: yaduktamavaktavyatvaṃ tat kiṃ kenāpi śabdenāvācyatvamuta sakṛdanekaśabdāvācyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1906: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ, tādṛśavāñchāyā evānutpattiriti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1911: itaścāsaṃgato 'naikāntavāda ityāha- svargeti /. kiñcānādisiddhor'hanmuniḥ, anye tu hetvanuṣṭhānānmucyante,
GSP33brsgor2u:1912: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha- anādīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1930: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha- samāna iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1931: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate- syāditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1934: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1939: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ |
GSP33brsgor2u:1940: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1941: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate- atheti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1949: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati- kiñceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1953: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto
GSP33brsgor2u:1958: syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati- ata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1966: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1970: saṃtānasyāvastunaḥ ātmatve śūnyavādaḥ, saṃtānasya vastutve saṃtānyatireke
GSP33brsgor2u:1971: ca kūṭasthātmavādaḥ, anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:1975: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati- antyeti. antyaśarīraparimāṇasyāvasthiternityatvadarśanādubhayorādyamadhyamaparimāṇayornityatvaprasaṅgādaviśeṣastrayāṇāṃ nityaparimāṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ syādviruddhaparimāṇānāmekatrāyogāditi sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1983: saṃpratyantyasya muktaparimāṇasyāṇutvasthūlatvayoranyataratvenāvasthitestadevāntyamādyamadhyamakālayorapi nityatvātsyāt prāgasato nityatvāyogāt, tathā cāviśeṣaḥ kālatraye 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:1990: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha- idānīmiti /. sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate- taditi /. svoktivirodhānmaivamityāha- prakṛtiścetyādinā. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1993: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti phalamabhipretya satvāsatvayorekatrāsaṃbhavavat kartṛtvopādānatvayorapyekatrāsaṃbhavāt kartaiveśvara iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kurvannavāntaramatabhedamāha- sā ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:1997: kāryaṃ mahadādikaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pradhānamīśvaraśca, yogaḥ samādhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1998: vidhistriṣavaṇasnānādiḥ , duḥkhānto mokṣa iti pañca padārthāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2000: pāśupatāgamapramāṇyāt paśupatirnimittameveti matamuktvānumānikeśvaramatamāha- tatheti. vimataṃ sakartṛkaṃ, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikāḥ kartāramīśvaraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2004: jñānaiśvaryotkarṣaḥ kvacidviśrāntaḥ, sātiśayatvāt, parimāṇavaditi sāṃkhyasaugatapātañjalā iti matvoktam- kecitkathañciditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2009: na cāgama eva mānam, āgamamānatvaniścaye mūlaniścayastanniścaye tanniścaya
GSP33brsgor2u:2011: naca puruṣavacasāṃ svatomānatvaṃ yuktaṃ, mitho virodhena tattvāvyavasthānācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:2012: nāpyanumānādīśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ kartaiveti nirṇayaḥ saṃbhavati, anumānasya dṛṣṭānusāritvena dṛṣṭaviparītārthāsādhakatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2013: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2014: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta, tarhi dravyopādānatvamapi kalpyatāṃ, karturevopādānatvena lāghavāt, anyathā svatantrapradhānaparamāṇvādyupādānakalpanāgauravāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2016: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2017: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo
GSP33brsgor2u:2019: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2020: na cātra dharmigrāhakānumānabādhaḥ, kāryatvaliṅgasya kartṛmātrasādhakatvena nirdeṣatvādāvudāsīnatvāt
GSP33brsgor2u:2021: na cotkarṣasamā jātiḥ, vyāpakadharmāpādānāt, doṣābhāve tadvyāpyaviṣamakartṛtvāyogācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:2023: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:2024: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2025: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate- prāṇīti. jaḍasya karmaṇaḥ prerakatvāyogānmaivamityāha- neti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2026: na ceśvarapreritaṃ karmeśvarasya prerakamiti vācyamityāha- karmeti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2027: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate- nānāditvāditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2029: naca tadapīśvareṇa preritaṃ sadīśvaraṃ prerayati, uktānyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2035: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti
GSP33brsgor2u:2038: asmākaṃ tu 'eṣa hyeva sādhvasādhu kārayati'iti, 'niravadyam'iti ca śrutimūlaṃ pūrvakarmāpekṣākalpanamiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2040: pravartakatvaliṅgāddoṣā iti tārkikāṇāṃ sthitiḥ, tathāceśvaraḥ svārthe rāgādimān, pravartakatvāt, saṃmatavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:2043: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha- puruṣeti. //37//
GSP33brsgor2u:2049: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2050: kāryabalāt preraṇayogyātvākhyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyatāmityata āha- nāpyanya
GSP33brsgor2u:2052: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2059: na hyamanaskasya jñānaṃ saṃbhavati, jñānaṃ manojanyamiti vyāptivirodhānnityajñānakalpanānavakāśāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2060: pradhānavatparamāṇūnāmapi niravayaveśvareṇa saṃyogādyasattvātpreryatvāyogaḥ , prerakatve ceśvarasya doṣavattvamityāha- evamanyāsvapīti. //38//
GSP33brsgor2u:2072: svabhogāhetutve satīti viśeṣaṇānna vyabhicāra ityāha- tathāpīti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2075: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2081: jīve karaṇakṛtā bhogadayo dṛśyante, īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2086: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha- itaśceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2087: kimataṃ seśvaraṃ, kāryatvāt, rāṣṭravaditi kalpayato rājavatsaśarīra
GSP33brsgor2u:2090: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ, śarīrasya bhautikatvaniyamādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2091: astvaśarīra eveśvara ityata āha- niradhiṣṭhānatve. ceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2092: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati- karaṇavaditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2099: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ- antavatvamiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2103: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2113: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2123: māṣādivadityanumānādādastīyattā, tadajñāne syādasarvajñatā, iyattāyāṃ cāntavattvamapyakṣatamiti pariharati- tata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2124: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham
GSP33brsgor2u:2132: vedāviruddhāṃśamaṅgīkṛtya vedaviruddhaṃ jīvotpattyaṃśaṃ nirākartumadhikaraṇārambha ityāha- ucyata iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2134: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:2138: kathaṃ tarhyadvitīye vāsudeve mūrtibhedaḥ, tatrāha- sa iti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2141: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:2148: 'samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvā'iti, 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate'ityādyā ca śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2156: jīvasyotpattiṃ nirasya jīvānmanasa utpattiṃ nirasyati- naca karturiti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2157: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2158: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2160: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:2162: śilpno hastādikaraṇāntarasattvātkuṭhārakartṛtvaṃ yuktaṃ, jīvasya tu karaṇāntarāsattvānna manasaḥ kartṛtvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2163: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brsgor2u:2167: saṃkarṣaṇādīnāmutpattyasaṃbhave 'pi vyūhacatuṣṭayaṃ syāditi sūtravyāvartyamāśaṅkate- athāpi syāditi. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2168: jñānaiśvaryayoḥ śaktirāntaraṃ sāmarthyaṃ, balaṃ śarīrasāmarthyaṃ, vīryaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2175: īśvaratvājjanmāsaṃbhavo guṇa evetyāha- tasmāditi /. sūtreṇa siddhāntayati- atreti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2178: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2180: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2183: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha- nacaita
GSP33brsgor2u:2188: itaśca jīvotpattivāda upekṣya ityāha sūtrakāraḥ- vipratiṣedhācceti. /
GSP33brsgor2u:2190: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2195: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor2u:2196: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2197: pādaḥ . dvitīyādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /. viyadādividhātāraṃ sītāsyābjamadhuvratam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2202: pariharannādāvekadeśitamāha- na viyadaśruteḥ /. viyatprāṇāpādayorarthaṃ saṃkṣipan pūrvapādena saṃgatimāha- vedānteṣviti
GSP33brsgor2u:2205: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo
GSP33brsgor2u:2206: 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2209: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2216: atrākāśasyotpattyanutpattiśrutyormithoviridho 'sti na veti vākyabhedaikavākyatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti
GSP33brsgor2u:2217: pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi gṛhṇātītyāha- tatra tāvaditi /. utpattiśrutirmukhyā nāstīti gūḍhābhisaṃdhiḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:2221: saṃprati pūrvapakṣayati sūtrakāraḥ- asti tviti /. ekavākyatvena prāmāṇyasaṃbhave kimiti śrutyoraprāmāṇyamiti śaṅkate- nanvekavākyateti /. ekavākyatvāsaṃbhavādaprāmāṇyaṃ yuktamityāha- satyamityādinā /. ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate- nanu sakṛditi /. aprāmāṇyavādī dūṣayati- naivamiti /. kramo na yujyate dvayoḥ śrutaprāthamyabhaṅgāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2225: tittiriśrutestadviruddhārthatvamāha- eteneti /. etatpadārthamāha- tasmāditi /. chāndogye 'pi śrutaṃ tejasaḥ prāthamyamatra duryojyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2226: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate, atra tu vāyuriti
GSP33brsgor2u:2231: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha- asminniti /. evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ, paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2233: tatra śrutyorvirodhe satyadhyayanavidhyupāttayoraprāmāṇyayogādviyadutpattyasaṃbhavarūpatakrānugṛhītacchāndogyaśrutirmukhyārthā itarā gauṇītyavirodha ityekadeśimataṃ vivṛṇoti- nāstītyādinā /. ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvāt, ātmavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:2236: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2237: prāgabhāvaśūnyatvāccātmavadākāśo notpadyata ityāha- utpattimatāṃ ceti /. prakāśaścākṣuṣānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2242: prāgabhāvasattvaṃ sphuṭayati- kiṃ hīti /. sthūlāśrayo 'vakāśaḥ sūkṣmāśrayacchidramaṇvāśrayaḥ suṣiramiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2243: kiñcātmavadākāśo na jāyate, vibhutvāt, asparśadravyatvāccetyāha- pṛthivyādīti /. tasmāduktatarkabalādgauṇī draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2244: bhedoktergauṇatve vaidikodāharaṇamāha- vede 'pyāraṇyāniti /. ākāśeṣviti bhedavyapadeśo gauṇa iti saṃbandhaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor2u:2248: na kevalaṃ tarkādākāśasyānutpattiḥ, kintu śrutito 'pītyāha-sūtrakāraḥ- śabdācceti /. nityabhāvasyānāditvāditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:2260: yogyatābalādityāha- syācceti /. udāharaṇāntaramāha- yathā ceti /. abhedopacāro bhaktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2261: mukhyasiddhāntyākṣipati- kathaṃ punariti /. sa evākṣepadvayaṃ spaṣṭayati- nanviti /. advitīyatvaśrutibādhaḥ sarvavijñānapratijñābādhaścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2262: prathamākṣepaṃ dṛṣṭāntena pariharati- ekameveti /. kāryarūpadvitīyaśūnyatvaṃ prāgavasthāyāmavadhāraṇaśrutyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2267: nāstītyāha- naca nabhasāpīti /. dharmasāmye brahmanabhasoḥ kathaṃ bhedaḥ, tatrāha- sargakāle tviti /. dharmasāmyādadvitīyatvopacāra ityarthe śrutimāha- tathā cākaśeti /. dvitīyamākṣepaṃ pariharati- ata eveti /. abhedopacārādevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2273: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati- pratijñeti /. ahānirabādhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2276: nanu sarvasya brahmāvyatirekātpratijñāyā ahānirityastu, tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt, kimutpattyetyata āha- śabdebhyaśceti /. avyatireka eva nyāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2281: tasmātpratijñāsiddhaye ākāśasya kāryatvenaivāvyatireko vācya iti dṛṣṭāntasṛṣṭisārvātmyaśabdānāha- tathā hīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2282: tena tena dṛṣṭānteneti /. yajuṣi dundubhyādidṛṣṭāntenātharvaṇe ūrṇanābhyādidṛṣṭāntenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2290: śākhābhedena prāthamyavyavasthāyā ayogāt, naikavākyateti prāpte mukhya eva
GSP33brsgor2u:2292: taccaikavākyatvaṃ balavacchrutyā durbalaśruteḥ kalpyaṃ, balavatī ca tittiriśrutiḥ, prakṛtipañcamyā paurvāparyākhyakramasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2296: kiñca sā śrutiḥ kiṃ tejojanmaparā, uta tejojanma viyadanucpattiścetyubhayaparā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2299: śrutyantaravirodhenobhayaparatvakalpanāyogādvākyabhedāpatteścetyāha- ekasyeti /. nanvekasya sraṣṭuranekārthasaṃbandhavadvākyasyāpyanekārthatā kiṃ na syādityata ā- sraṣṭā tviti /. ekasya karturanekārthasaṃbandho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2301: nānārthakaprayoge tu paya ānayetyādāvāvṛttyā vākyabheda eva /
GSP33brsgor2u:2303: phalitamāha- ityeketi /. ekasya śabdasyāvṛttiṃ vinānekārthatvaṃ nāsti cedasṛjateti śabdasya chāndogya upasaṃhṛtākāśādisaṃbandhārthamāvṛttidoṣaḥ syādityata āha- naceti /. chāndogyasthatejojanma ākāśādijanmapūrvakaṃ, tejojanmatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:2306: śrutyantarasthaḥ kramaḥ śrutyantare grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathāceti /. sṛṣṭau tātparyātātparyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭāntaśrutivaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate- nanvityādinā
GSP33brsgor2u:2307: tejaḥprāthamyasvīkāre ākāśasargo dharmi taddharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ ceti dvayaṃ śrutaṃ bādhanīyamiti gauravam, ākāśaprāthamye tvārthikatejaḥ sargaprāthamyamātrabādha iti lāghavamiti matvāha- netyucyata iti /. kiñca pradhānadharmityāgādvaraṃ guṇabhūtasya tejaḥprāthamyasya dharmasya tyāga ityāha- nahīti
GSP33brsgor2u:2308: kiñca kiṃ sṛṣṭiparaśrutisiddhatvāttejaḥprāthamyaṃ gṛhyata uta prathamasthāne tejasaḥ sargaśrutyārthātprāthamyabhānāt
GSP33brsgor2u:2309: nādya ityāha- apiceti /. dvitīyamanūdya dūṣayati- arthāttviti /. yaduktaṃ vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavādubhayoḥ prāthamyaṃ śākhābhedena vyavasthitaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:2311: kramabādhāpātāditi, tadiṣṭamevetyāha- vikalpeti /. na kevalaṃ śrutidevyoravirodhaḥ sauhārdaṃ cāstītyāha- apiceti /. viyadupasaṃgrāhyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2312: viyadanutpattivādinoktamanūdya pratijñāyā advitīyaśruteśca mukhyārthatātparyāvagamānna gauṇārthateti dūṣayati- yaccoktamityādinā /. prakṛtivikāranyāyastadananyatvanyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2313: udakaṃ kṣīrasthamapi kṣīrajñānānna gṛhyate bhedāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2314: māstu samyagjñānaṃ śruterbhrāntimūlatvasaṃbhavādityāśaṅkyāpauruṣeyatvānmaivamityāha- naca vedasyeti /. māyā bhrāntistayālīkaṃ mithyābhāṣaṇaṃ tena vañcanamayathārthabodhanam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2322: kāryameva vastvekadeśa ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvādityatra ākāśo vikāraḥ vibhaktatvāt ghaṭādivaditi satpratipakṣamāha- yatpunarityādinā
GSP33brsgor2u:2323: yo vibhaktaḥ sa vikāra ityanvayamuktvā yastvavikāraḥ sa na vibhakto yathātmeti vyatirikavyāptimāha- na tvavikṛtamiti /. digādiṣu vyabhicāramāśaṅkya pakṣasamatvānmaivamityāha- eteneti /. vibhaktatvenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2324: ātmani vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate- nanviti /. dharmisamānasattākavibhāgasya hetutvātparamārthātmani vibhāgasya kalpitatvena bhinnasattākatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha- neti /. atra cājñānānyadravyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam, ato nājñānatatsaṃbandhādau vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2326: ghaṭavadityābhāsatulyamidamanumānamityāśaṅkyātmanaḥ paramakāraṇatvena śrutasya kāryatve śūnyatāprasaṅga iti bādhakasattvāttasyābhāvatvaṃ, nātra kiñcidbādhakamasti pratyuta ākāśasyākāryatve nityānekadravyakalpanā śrautapratijñāhānyādayo bādhakāḥ santīti nābhāsatulyatetyāha- ātmana iti /. iṣṭaprasaṅga iti vadantaṃ pratyāha- ātmātvāditi /. ātmābhāvaḥ kenacijjñāyate na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2327: ādye yo jñātā sa pariśiṣyata iti na śūnyatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2329: kiñca yaddhi kāryaṃ sattāsphūrtyoranyāpekṣaṃ tannirākāryam, ātmā tvakārtho nirapekṣatvānna bādhayogya ityāha- nahyātmetyādinā /. kasyacitkāraṇasyāgantukaḥ kāryo na hi /
GSP33brsgor2u:2331: tatra sphūrterananyāyattatvaṃ vivṛṇoti- nahīti /. yaduktaṃ sureśvarācāryaiḥ-'pramātā ca pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ pramitistathā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2334: yathā śrutirāha-'puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotiḥ', 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:2335: nanvātmanaḥ svataḥ siddho pramāṇavaiyarthyaṃ, tatrāha- tasyeti /. nanu prameyasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha- nahīti /. ato na pramāṇavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2336: ātmāpi mānādhīnasiddhikaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha- ātmā tviti /. ayamarthaḥ-niścitasattākaṃ hi jñānaṃ prameyasattāniścāyakaṃ, gehe ghaṭo dṛṣṭo na veti jñānasaṃśaye na dṛṣṭa iti vyatirekaniścaye cārthasvarūpaniścayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2342: svaprakāśasyāpi bādhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha- naceti /. jaḍaṃ hi parāyattaprakāśatvādāgantukaṃ bādhayogyaṃ na prakāśātmasvarūpaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2343: tasya sarvabādhasākṣisvarūpasya nirākartrantarābhāvāt, svasya ca svanirākartṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2344: nahi sunipuṇenāpi svābhāvo draṣṭuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2345: evaṃ svataḥ sphūrtitvādātmā na bādhya ityuktvā svataḥ sattākatvācca na bādhya ityāha- tathāhameveti
GSP33brsgor2u:2348: māstu jīvato jñāturanyathāsvabhāvaḥ, mṛtasya tu syādityata āha- tatheti
GSP33brsgor2u:2350: anyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā saṃbhāvayitumapi na śakyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:2353: tataścātmanaḥ kāryatvanumānamābhāsa ityāha- evamiti /. akāryātmanaḥ siddhau tasyāvidyāsahitasyopādānasyadṛṣṭādinimittasya ca sattvādākāśānutpattihetoḥ sāmagrīśūnyatvasya svarūpāsiddheruktasatpratipakṣabādhāccākāśasya kāryatvaṃ niravadyamityāha- kāryatvaṃ ceti /. ātmāvidyayorvijātīyatvānnākāśārambhakatvamityuktamanūdya nirasyati- yattvityādinā /. kiṃ kāraṇamātrasya sājātyaniyama uta samavāyinaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2354: tatrādyaṃ nirasya dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate- syādetaditi /. kiṃ samavāyitāvacchedakadharmeṇa sājātyamuta sattvādinā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2355: nādya ityāha- tadapīti /. naca rajjavādi na dravyāntaramiti vācyaṃ, paṭāderapi tathātvāpātāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2356: dvitīyo 'smadiṣṭaḥ, ātmāvidyayorvastutvena sājātyādityāha- sattveti /. upādānasya sājātyaniyamaṃ nirasya saṃyuktānekatvaniyamamadvitīyasyāsaṅgasyāpyātmana upādānatvasiddhaye nirasyati- nāpītyādinā /. kimārambhakamātrasyāyaṃ niyama uta dravyārambhakasya /
GSP33brsgor2u:2357: nādya ityāha- aṇviti /. ddhvayaṇukasya jñānasya cāsamavāyikāraṇasaṃyogajanakamādyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsgor2u:2358: yadyapyadṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyukte aṇumanasī ādyakarmārambhake tathāpi karmasamavāyina ekatvādanekatvaniyamabhaṅga ityāha- ekaiko hīti /. dravyāntaraiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2360: dvitīyamutthāpyārambhavādānaṅgīkāreṇa dūṣayati- dravyetyādinā /. na tvabhyupagamyate tasmānnaiṣa niyama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2361: yattu kṣīraparamāṇuṣu rasāntarotpattau taireva dadhyārambha iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2365: loke kartu- sahāyadarśanādasahāyādbrahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ sarga iti, tatrāha- tathācoktamiti /. prāgabhāvaśūnyatvaheturapyasiddha ityāha- yaccoktamityādinā /. śabdāśrayatvaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2366: śabdādimānākāśaḥ pralaye nāsti, 'nāsīdrajo no vyoma'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2369: na hyākāśābhāvastaddharmo vā kāṭhinyaṃ kintu mūrtadravyaviśeṣastasaṃyogaviśeṣo vā kāṭhinyaṃ, tacca pralaye nāstīti
GSP33brsgor2u:2371: 'ākāśaśarīraṃ brahma'iti śruteragnyauṣṇyavadbrahmasvabhāvasyākāśasya sati brahmaṇi kathamabhāvaḥ, tatrāha- yathāceti /. vibhutvādākāśasamaṃ brahmeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2373: vibhaktatvādiliṅgasahitāgamabādhamāha- yadapītyādinā /. dharmivikārabhāve guṇanāśo na syāditi tarkārthamanityapadam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2375: tacca svasamānasattākaguṇavattvam, ato nirguṇātmani na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2377: svarūpāsiddhimapyāha- vibhutvādīnāṃ ceti /. sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo vā vibhutvaṃ nirguṇātmani dṛṣṭānte nāsti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2386: nanu 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā'iti śrutirnityatvenaiva sāmyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsgor2u:2389: nyūnatvāccākāśasya na mukhyopamānatvamityāha- jyāyāniti /. mukhyopamānāsattve śrutiḥ-'na tasya'iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2391: anityatvenāsattve śrutimāha- ato 'nyaditi /. yattvekasyaiva saṃbhūtaśabdasya gauṇatvaṃ mukhyatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2393: ākāśe 'pi tasya mukhyatvasaṃbhavādityāha- tapasīti /. balavattittiriśrutyā chāndogyaśruternayanādekavākyatayā sraṣṭari brahmātmani samanvaya ityupasaṃharati- tasmāditi. //7//
GSP33brsgor2u:2400: saṃśaye gauṇapakṣapūrvapakṣasiddhāntapakṣānatidiśati- tatrāpītyādinā /. pūrvatra hyākāśānantaryaṃ tejasaḥ sthāpitaṃ, tatra vāyutejasostulyavadānantarye vāyoragniriti kramaśrutibādhātpaurvāparye tejaḥprāthamyabhaṅgānnaikavākyateti pūrvapakṣe gauṇavādyabhiprāyamāha- tataśceti /. astamayapratiṣedho mukhyotpattyasaṃbhave liṅgam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2405: etairliṅgairvāyuranādyananta iti pratīterutpattirgauṇītyavirodhaḥ śrutyoriti prāpte pratipipādayiṣitapratijñāśruterbalīyastvāttatsādhakānāṃ tatra tatra vāyūtpattivākyānāṃ bhūyastvāduktavibhaktatvādiliṅgānugrahācca mukhyaiva vāyorutpattiḥ, tathācākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejo 'sṛjateti
GSP33brsgor2u:2408: mukhyasiddhāntamāha- pratijñetyādinā /. kṛtaṃ pratividhānamāpekṣikatvena samādhānaṃ yasya tattathā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2411: tāmeva śaṅkāmāha- saṃvargeti /. vyaṣṭisamaṣṭyupāstiḥ 'vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ veda'ityupāstiścādiśabdārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2418: virodho 'sti na vetyekavākyatvabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe 'sti virodha iti pūrvapakṣe yathā vāyvāderamṛtatvādikamutpattiśrutibalādāpekṣikaṃ tathā brahmānāditvamāpekṣikamiti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā ekadeśipakṣaṃ prāpayati- viyaditi /. brahma kutaścijjāyate, kāraṇatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:2421: mukhyasiddhāntamāha- tāmiti /. brahma na ca jāyate, kāraṇaśūnyatvāt, naraviṣāṇavat, vyatirekeṇa ghaṭavaccetyanumānānugrahādvipakṣecākāraṇakakāryavādaprasaṅgādbrahmānāditvaśrutayo balīyasya iti kāraṇatvaliṅgabādhājjanmaśrutiḥ kāryābhedena vyākhyeyetyanādyanantabrahmasamanvayasiddhiriti siddhāntaphalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2423: tathāhi-kiṃ sanmātrasya brahmaṇaḥ sanmātrameva sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadviśeṣo
GSP33brsgor2u:2425: na tredhāpītyāha- sanmātraṃ hītyādinā /. dīpastu dīpāntare nimittamityanudāharaṇam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2428: tarkeṇāpi bādhamāha- naca vikārebhya ityādinā /. kāraṇasyānabhyupagame yadṛcchāvādaprasaṅgaḥ, anādikāraṇānabhyupagame
GSP33brsgor2u:2433: tejo 'tastathāhyāha /. 'tattejo 'sṛjata'iti 'vāyoragniḥ'iti ca śrutyorvirodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe sāmānyātsāmānyotpattyasaṃbhave 'pi brahmavāyvoḥ sāmānyostejorūpaviśeṣopādānatvasaṃbhavāttulyabalatayāsti virodha iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2435: pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ virodhādaprāmāṇyaṃ phalaṃ, siddhānte prāmāṇyamityuktaṃ na vismartavyam
GSP33brsgor2u:2436: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe kāryamātrasya vivartatvātkalpitasya vāyostejaḥkalpanādhiṣṭhānatvāyogādbrahmaiva tejasa upādānaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ brahmaivopādānamityarthe śrutīnāṃ bhūyastvācca tadanurodhādvāyoriti kramārthā pañcamītyavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaṃ prāpayati- prāptaṃ tāvadbrahmayonikaṃ teja ityādinā /. śrutīnāṃ virodhamātropanyāsena pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2445: naca 'bahu syām'iti kāryābhede kṣaṇiliṅgādupādānatvasiddhiḥ liṅgācchruterbalīyastvena śrutyavirodhena liṅgasya neyatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2446: nayanaṃ cetthaṃ vāyorbrahmānanyatvādvāyujasyāpi tejaso brahmaprakṛtikatvamaviruddhamiti siddhāntagranthāśayaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2447: ihādhikārāditi /. vāyoragniḥ saṃbhūta iti vākye saṃbandhādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2449: nirapekṣakārakavibhakterūpapadasāpekṣavibhaktyapekṣayā prabalatvācca na kramārthā pañcamītyāha- apiceti /. ūrdhvamanantaramiti vopapadaṃ vinā pañcamīmātrātkramo na bhātīti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2451: viśeṣato 'tra prakaraṇādapādānārthatvaṃ pañcamyāḥ kḷptaṃ kḷptena ca kalpyaṃ sati virodhe bādhyamiti sthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2452: pāramparyajatvamevāha- yadāpīti /. tasyā dhenoḥ śṛtaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ, dadhyādikaṃ tu pāramparyajamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2454: brahmaṇe vāyubhāve mānamāha- darśayati ceti /. pāramparyajasyāpi tajjatvavyapadeśe smṛtimāha- tathāceti /. antaḥkaraṇādibhyo jāyamānabuddhyādīnāṃ matta evetyavadhāraṇaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2462: tathā hyātharvaṇe muṇḍakagranthe 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇica /
GSP33brsgor2u:2463: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī'iti mantre 'pāṃ brahmajatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2464: 'agnerāpaḥ'iti śrutyā tasya virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tulyatvādasti virodha iti pūrvapakṣe apāmagnidāhyatvena virodhādagnijatvāsaṃbhavātkramārthā pañcamītyavirodha ityadhikāśaṅkyāmuktejonyāyamatidiśya vyācaṣṭe- ata iti /. pratyakṣavirodhe kathamapāmagnijatvanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha- sati vacana iti
GSP33brsgor2u:2465: trivṛtkṛtayoraptejasorvirodhe 'pyagnerāpa iti vacanādatīndriyayostayornāsti virodha iti nirṇīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2466: na kevalaṃ śrutyavirodhajñānāyāyamatideśaḥ kintu pañcabhūcatotpattikramanirṇayārthaṃ cetyāha- tejasastviti /. tasmāttejobhāvāpanne brahmaṇi śrutisamanvaya iti siddham //11//
GSP33brsgor2u:2470: pṛthivyadhikārarūpaśabdāntarebhyaḥ /. viṣayamuktvānnaśabdamahābhūtaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha- tā iti /. abhyavahāryaṃ bhakṣyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2471: atra śrutau yadyannamodanādikaṃ tadā 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutyā virodhaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2472: yadi pṛthivī tadā na virodha iti phalaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2477: virodhānnaikavākyateti prāpte siddhāntayati- evaṃ prāpta iti /. adhikāraḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2479: payaḥ kṣīraṃ tadvatpāṇḍuraṃ śvetam, aṅgāravadrohitaṃ raktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2480: śabdāntaraśabditaṃ sthānaṃ vyācaṣṭe- śrutyantaramapīti /. abānantaryaṃ pṛthivyāḥ sthānaṃ śrutyantarasiddhaṃ tenāpyannasya pṛthivītvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2481: tattatra sṛṣṭikāle yadapāṃ śaraḥ yo maṇḍavaddhanībhāva āsītsa eva samahanyata kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāto 'bhūt sāpāṃ kaṭhinā pariṇatiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2483: vrīhyādyannasargaḥ kasminsthāna iti vivakṣāyāmāha- pṛthivyāstviti /. pañcamīyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2485: ityāśaṅkyāha- vākyaśeṣo 'pīti /. prabaladurbalapramāṇasaṃnipāte bahūnāṃ durbalānāmatyantabādhādvaraṃ prabalapramāṇasyālpabādhena kathañcinnayanamiti nyāyena śrutiliṅgayorannamātraniṣṭhatvaṃ bādhitvānnānannātmakapṛthivīniṣṭhatvaṃ nīyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:2489: evaṃ tittiriśrutyanusāreṇa chandogaśruternayanādaviruddho bhūtasṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham //12//
GSP33brsgor2u:2493: saṃprati tāni bhūtānyāśrityāśrayāśrayibhāvasaṃgatyā teṣāṃ svātantryamāśaṅkya niṣedhati- tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ /. uktabhūtānyāśritya saṃśayapūrvapakṣau darśayati- kimimānītyādinā /. saṃśayabījānuktau pūrvottarapakṣayuktayo bījamiti jñeyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2494: nanvatra bhūtānāṃ kiṃ svātantryeṇopādānatvamāśaṅkyate kartṛtvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2495: nādyaḥ, 'racanānupapatteḥ'ityādinyāyavirodhāditi śaṅkate- nanviti /. na dvitīyaḥ, acetanatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2500: tathāca mithonirapekṣeśvarabhūtakartṛśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya iti saphalaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha- naiṣa doṣa iti /. bhūtānāṃ tadabhimānidevatānāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2501: yathā ākāśādibhāvāpannabrahmaṇaḥ sarvopādānatvaṃ tathā tadabhimānidevatājīvabhāvamāpannabrahmaṇaḥ kartṛtvamiti paramparayā īśvarakartṛtvaśrutyavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2503: mukhyasiddhāntamāha- evaṃ prāpta iti /. ākāśādiśabdairna devatālakṣaṇā mukhyārthe bādhakābhāvāt pañcamyaśca prakṛtitvārthāstatra rūḍhataratvāt, tathā cācetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2505: yadyapi devatānāṃ kartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpīśvaraniyamyatvaśravaṇāccetanānāmapi na svātantryaṃ, kimu vācyamacetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ na svātantryamiti matvoktam- talliṅgāditi /. tattadacetanātmanāvasthitasya brahmaṇa upādānatve 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:2506: jīvavyāvṛtteśvaratvākāreṇaiva sākṣātsarvakartṛtvaṃ na jīvatvadvārā tasya sarvaniyantṛtvālliṅgādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2507: prakaraṇācca sākṣātsarvakartṛtvamityāha- tatheti /. pūrvoktamanūdya nirasyati- yattviti /. parameśvarasyāntaryāmibhāvenāveśaḥ saṃbandhastadvaśādbhūteṣvīkṣaṇaśravaṇaṃ naitāvatā teṣāṃ cetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2509: itthaṃ sūtrayojanā-sa īśvarastattadātmanā sthito 'pi sākṣādeva sarvakartā tasyāntaryāmitvaliṅgāt
GSP33brsgor2u:2510: jīvatvadvārā kartṛtvaṃ nāma jīvasyaiva kartṛtvamityantaryāmiṇaḥ kartṛtvāsiddherantaryāmitvāyogāttadabhidhyānādīśvarekṣaṇādeva bhūteṣu śrutekṣaṇopapatteśceti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2511: tatteja aikṣateti śruta īkṣitā paramātmaivetyatra śrutyantaraṃ prakaraṇaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2512: cāha- nānya iti /. tasmādīśvarapadārthalopaprasaṅgeneśvarādanyasya svātantryābhāvānneśvarakartṛtvaśruterbhūtaśrutyā virodha iti siddham //13//
GSP33brsgor2u:2516: viparyayeṇa tu /. yadyapyatra śrutivirodho na parihriyata ityasaṃgatistathāpyutpattikrame nirūpite layakramo buddhistho vicāryata iti prāsaṅgikyāveva pādāvāntarasaṃgatī iti matvāha- bhūtānāmiti /. atrotpattikramādviparītakramanirṇayātsiddhānte bhūtānāṃ prātilemyena layadhyānapūrvakaṃ pratyagbrahmaṇi manaḥsamādhānaṃ phalaṃ, pūrvapakṣe tu kāraṇanāśe sati kāryanāśa iti sarvalayādhārabrahmāsiddheruktasamādhyasiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2517: sati mahābhūtānāṃ laye kramacintā sa eva nāstīti kecittānpratyāha- trayo
GSP33brsgor2u:2518: 'pīti /. aniyama ityanāsthayoktaṃ śrautasya pralayasya kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrauta utpattikrama eva grāhyaḥ, śrautatvenāntaraṅgatvādityevaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2519: sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ naśyatīti loke dṛśyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:2520: tathāca śrauto 'pyutpattikramo laye na gṛhyate kintu laukikakrama eva
GSP33brsgor2u:2522: kāraṇameva hi kāryasya svarūpamiti tadananyatvanyāyena sthāpitam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2523: na hi svarūpanāśe kāryasya kṣaṇamapi sthitiryuktā tasmādayogya utpattikramo layasya na grāhyaḥ laukikakramāvarodhena nirākāṅkṣātvāditi
GSP33brsgor2u:2524: siddhāntayati- tato brūma ityādinā /. krameṇa paramparayā sarvakāryalayādhāratvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kimityāśrīyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:2525: sākṣādeva tatkiṃ na syādityata āha- nahi svakāraṇavyatikrameṇeti /. ghaṭanāśe mṛdanupalabdhiprasaṅgādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2526: 'vāyuśca līyate vyomni taccāvyakte pralīyate'iti smṛtiśeṣa ādipadārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2530: antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṅgād iti cen nāviśeṣāt |
GSP33brsgor2u:2531: antarāviśeṣāt /. uktabhūtotpattilayakramamupajīvya sa kiṃ karaṇotpattikrameṇa virudhyate na veti karaṇānāmabhautikatvabhautikatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe vṛttānuvādapūrvakaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2532: pūrvapakṣamāha- bhūtānāmityādinā /. karaṇānyeva na santīti vadantaṃ pratyāha- sendriyasyeti /. 'manasastu parā buddhiryo buddheḥ paratastu saḥ',
GSP33brsgor2u:2535: karaṇānāṃ kramākāṅkṣāmāha- tayoriti /. ākāṅkṣāyāṃśrutisiddhaḥ kramo grāhya ityāha- apiceti /. vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ sendriyā buddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2536: ātmano bhūtānāṃ cāntarā madhye talliṅgātsṛṣṭivākyāt 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo
GSP33brsgor2u:2539: naca karaṇānāṃ bhautikatvādbhūtānantaryamiti vācyaṃ, teṣāṃ bhautikatve mānābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2540: tathā cātmanaḥ prathamamākāśasya janma paścādvāyorityuktakramasyātmanaḥ karaṇāni tato bhūtānīti krameṇa virodha iti tittiryatharvaṇaśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya iti pūrvapakṣaphalam siddhāntayati- neti /. 'ātmana ākāśaḥ'ityādi tittiriśrutau pañcamyāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvenārthataḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2542: na tasyātharvaṇapāṭhena bādhaḥ arthakramavirodhikramaviśeṣasyāśruteḥ pāṭhakramasyārthakramadhīśeṣasya śeṣibādhakatvāyogāditaḥ śrutyarthakramāvirodhena pāṭhasya neyatvādbhūtānantaryaṃ karaṇānāmityarthaḥ kiñca bhautikatvātteṣāṃ tadānantaryamityāha- yadīti /. naca prāṇasyābvikāratvāyogādannamayamityādimayaṭo na vikārārthateti
GSP33brsgor2u:2545: prācuryārthatve tvanākāṅkṣitoktiprasaṅgācchrutyaiva tejobannaprāśena vākprāṇamanasāṃ vṛddhistadabhāve tannāśa iti vikāratvasya darśitatvānna vivādāvasaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2546: yadvā sthūlabhūtādhīnā teṣāṃ vṛddhirvikāro mayaḍarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo bhautikatve liṅgaṃ prāṇendriyamanāṃsi bhautikāni bhūtādhīnavṛddhimattvāddehavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2547: nanu teṣāṃ bhautikatve kathamātharvaṇe pṛthak tajjanmakathanaṃ bhūtajanmoktyaiva tajjanmasiddherityata āha- vyapadeśo 'pīti /. prauḍhavādena teṣāmabhautikatvamupetyāpi śrutyavirodhamāha- atha tviti /. karaṇānāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca pūrvāparatve mānābhāvānnoktabhūtakramabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2549: tarhi kathaṃ kramanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha- tatheti /. idaṃ sthūlamutpatteḥ prāk prajāpatiḥ sūtrātmāsīt atra sūkṣmabhūtātmakaprajāpattisargaḥ prathamastato manaādisarga iti kramo bhātīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2550: evañca bhūtakaraṇotpattiśrutyoravirodhādbrahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti siddhāntaphalaṃ nigamayati- tasmāditi. //15//
GSP33brsgor2u:2553: carācaravyapāśrayas tu syāt tadvyapadeśo bhāktas tadbhāvabhāvitvāt |
GSP33brsgor2u:2554: carācarabhāvitvāt /. evaṃ tāvattatpadavācyakāraṇanirṇayāya bhūtaśrutīnāṃ virodho nirastaḥ idānīmā pādamāptestvaṃpadārthaśuddhyai jīvaśrutīnāṃ virodho nirasyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:2557: iti pūrvapakṣayati- sta iti /. tathāca karaṇotpattikrameṇa bhūtakramasya bādhābhāve 'pi jīvotpattikrameṇa bādhaḥ syāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2559: cetanajanmādyuddeśena cetanasya tasya janmāntarīyaphalasādhanaṃ jātakarmādisaṃskāro vidhīyate
GSP33brsgor2u:2561: neyam'iti nyāyājjanmādikaṃ dehopādhikaṃ na svata iti siddhāntayati- tāmityādinā /. jīvāpetaṃ jīvena tyaktamidaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brsgor2u:2563: jīve tu bhākto gauṇa aupādhikajanmādiviṣayaḥ syādupādhijanmabhāve bhāvādasatyabhāvāditi sūtrārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2564: jīvasyaupādhikajanmamṛtyau śrutimapyāha- sa vā iti /. jāyamānapadārthamāha- śarīramiti /. mriyamāṇatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe- utkrāmanniti /. nanūttaratra jīvasya janmādi nirasyate, atrāpi tannirāse punaruktirityāśaṅkyāha- jīvasyeti
GSP33brsgor2u:2569: nātmāśruternityatvācca tābhyaḥ /. agnervisphuliṅgavadetasmāparamātmanaḥ sarve jīvātmāno vyuccaranti ityādijīvotpattiśrutīnāṃ 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ' 'aja
GSP33brsgor2u:2572: dehāntarabhogyasvargādihetuvidhyādyasaṃbhavāt, kalpādyantayornabhasa iva jīvasya tau kiṃ na syātāṃ tatsaṃbhavāditi pratyudāharaṇena
GSP33brsgor2u:2573: pūrvapakṣamāha- tatra prāptaṃ tāvaditi /. phalaṃ pūrvavat /
GSP33brsgor2u:2575: nanvavikṛtaṃ brahmaivātra praviṣṭaṃ jīvo na tattvāntaramiti
GSP33brsgor2u:2576: pratijñāsiddhiḥ, tatrāha- naceti /. jīvaḥ parasmādbhinnaḥ, viruddhadharmavattvādbhinnasyāvikāratve pratijñābādha iti
GSP33brsgor2u:2580: tatrāha- na ceti /. evaṃ vikāratve sati vikāraprapañcātmanā svātmānamakurutetivadvikārajīvātmanā praveśa ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2581: ajatvādiśrutiḥ kalpamadhye jīvasyānutpattyādiviṣayā, tattvamasīti śrutiśca mṛda, ghaṭa ityabhedavākyavadvyākhyeyeti prāpte siddhāntayati- evamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:2583: nādyaḥ, asiddherityāha- atrocyate nāsyeti /. dvitīye jīvasya na svato vikāratvasiddhiḥ, aprayojakatvādityāha- buddhyādīti /. aupādhikabhede mānamāha- tathāceti /. mayaṭo vikārārthatvamāśaṅkyāha- tanmayatvaṃ ceti /. jālmaḥ kāmajaḍaḥ strīparatantraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2584: strīmaya itivajjīvasya svarūpājñānādbuddhyādiparatantratvena bhedakartṛtvādibhāktvātprācuryārthe mayaṭprayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2585: liṅgaṃ nirasya tadanugrāhyaśrutergatimāha- yadapīti /. jīvasyaupādhikajanmanāśayoḥ śrutimāha- tatheti /. etebhyo dehātmana pariṇatebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ sāmyenotthāya janitvā tānyeva līyamānānyanu paścādvinaśyati
GSP33brsgor2u:2587: nanu prajñānaghanaḥ, saṃjñā nāstīti ca viruddhamityata āha- tatheti /. upādhilayādviśeṣajñānābhāva eva saṃjñābhāvo nātmasvarūpavijñānābhāva ityuttaraṃ pratipādayati śrutirityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2588: atraivātmani vijñānaghane pretyasaṃjñā nāstītyuktyā mā mohāntaṃ mohamadhyaṃ bhrāntimāpīpadadāpāditavānimamarthaṃ na jānāmi brūhi tvadukterarthamiti maitreyīpraśnārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2589: munirāha- na vā iti /. mohaṃ mohakaraṃ vākyamucchittiḥ pūrvāvasthānāśo dharmo 'syetyucchittidharmā pariṇāmī sa
GSP33brsgor2u:2591: tarhi na pretya saṃjñeti kathamuktaṃ, tatrāha- mātreti /. mātrābhirviṣayairasaṃsargāttathoktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2592: bimbapratibimbayoriva viruddhādharmabhedo 'dhyasta ityatra hetumāha- ata ūrdhvamiti /. jīvasya vikāritve muktyayogāttattvamasīti vākyamakhaṇḍanārthamiti ca vaktavyaṃ, tathāca phalavatpradhānavākyāpekṣitajīvanityatvaśrutīnāṃ balavattvādutpattyādhikamadhyastamanuvadantyutpattyādiśrutaya ityavirodha iti siddham //17//
GSP33brsgor2u:2600: anutpattau hi svaprakāśaṃ brahmaivopahitaṃ jīva iti jīvasya svaprakāśatā sidhyati /
GSP33brsgor2u:2601: na caivaṃ gatārthatā, anutpannasyāpi jīvasya svaprakāśatve
GSP33brsgor2u:2602: jñānasādhanavaiyarthyamiti tarkasahitānityajñānaśrutibalena svaprakāśatvaśruterbādhyatayā brahmānyatvaśaṅkāyāṃ tadaikyayogyatāyai svaprakāśatvasyātra sādhanāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2603: tathāca pūrvapakṣe jīvasya brahmaikyāyogyatā siddhānte tadyogyatetyāpādasamāpteḥ phalamavagantavyam
GSP33brsgor2u:2604: iṣṭāpattiṃ nirācaṣṭe- te pṛṣṭā iti /. sādhanādhīnajñānatvānna svaprakāśo jīvo vyatirekeṇeśvaravadityāha- ataḥ kādācitketi /. yathāśrute bhāṣye hetoḥ sādhyāviśeṣa iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2605: ato jīvasya svaprakāśatvaśrutirbādhyeti prāpte siddhāntayati- evamiti /. cecchabdo niścayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2606: na kevala svaprakāśabrahmābhedājjīvasya svaprakāśatā kintu śrutito
GSP33brsgor2u:2607: 'pītyāha- vijñānamayeti /. yo 'yaṃ vijñānamaya iti prakaraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2608: asuptaḥ svayaṃ bhāsamāna evātmā saptāṃlluptavyāpārānvāgādīnabhilakṣya cākaśīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2610: atra svapne vijñāturbuddhisattvasya sākṣiṇo vijñātervināśo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2611: ghrāṇādijanyagandhādijñānānusaṃdhānasiddhaye ātmano jñānarūpatvaṃ vācyamiti śrutyantareṇāha- atheti /. ātmano nityacidrūpatve 'pi svato 'saṅgatayā
GSP33brsgor2u:2612: gandhādyasaṃbandhāttatsaṃbandhaghaṭanātmakavṛttyarthāni jñānasādhanānīti na teṣāṃ vaiyarthyamityāha- na gandheti /. paricchedo vṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2615: dūṣayati- yatviti /. tattadāsuṣuptau na paśyatīti yattatpaśyannevāluptajñāna eva sanna paśyatītyatra hetuḥ- nahīti
GSP33brsgor2u:2617: kimiti na paśyatītyata āha- na tviti /. vṛtteḥ sādhanādhīnatvoktyā svarūpajñānasyāsādhanādhīnatvaṃ heturasiddha ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2622: kiñca niravayavātmano manaḥ-saṃyogānnānityajñānaguṇatā samavāyābhāvācca na svasamavetajñānavedyatā karmakartṛtvavirodhācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:2623: kiñca jñānatvasyaikavṛttitve lāghavādātmaiva jñānaṃ vṛtteśca manaḥpariṇāmatvaśrutyā 'kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ'ityādyayā jaḍatvānnāsmākaṃ jñānadvaividhyagauravamityanavadyamātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvamiti siddham
GSP33brsgor2u:2628: utkrāntigatyāgatīnām /. viṣayasaṃśayau darśayati- idānīmiti /. nātmāśruterityādinā gatārthatvamasyāśaṅkyātmāṇutvaśrutīnāṃ mahattvaśrutīnāṃ cāvirodhakathanārthamasyādhikaraṇasyārambha
GSP33brsgor2u:2630: śrutyāpītyāha- svaśabdeneti /. pūrvapakṣe jīvasyāṇutvādbrahmaikyāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā
GSP33brsgor2u:2631: sūtraṃ vyākurvanpūrvapakṣamāha- tatra prāptamityādinā /. śruteraṇuriti uttarasūtrādākṛṣya sūtraṃ pūritam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2633: sa mumūrṣuḥ jīva etairbuddhyādibhistasmāccandralokādimaṃ lokaṃ prati karma kartumāyātītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2637: utkrāntirātmano dehānnirgamo na bhavati yenāṇutvaṃ syāt kintu svāmitvanivṛttiriti kecit /
GSP33brsgor2u:2638: tadaṅgīkṛtyāpyaṇutvamāvaśyakamityāha- svātmaneti /. utkrānteruttarayorgatyāgatyayoḥ svātmanā kartrā saṃbandhādaṇutvamiti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2639: pākānāśrayasya paktṛtvavadratyanāśrayasyāpi gantṛtvoktiḥ kiṃ na syādityata
GSP33brsgor2u:2641: jīvo 'ṇuramadhyamaparimāṇatve sati gatimattvātparamāṇuvadityāha- amadhyameti /. aṅgīkāraṃ tyajati- satyośceti /. na svāmyanivṛttimātramutkrāntirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2643: anyebhyo vā mukhādibhya eṣa ātmā niṣkrāmatīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2644: kiñca dehamadhye 'pi jīvasya gatyāgatiśruteraṇutvamityāha- sa iti /. indriyāṇi gṛhṇansvāpādau hṛdayaṃ sa jīvo gacchati śukraṃ prakāśakamindriyagrāmamādāya punarjāgaritasthānamāgacchatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2649: nanu mahattvaśruteḥ kathaṃ paraprakaraṇasthatvamityata āha- parasyeti /. yā vedāntaśrutiḥ sā paraprakaraṇasthetyutsargāttasyāstatsthatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2651: vijñānamayaśrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamiti śaṅkate- nanviti /. aṇorjīvasya brahmaṇā bhedabhedāṅgīkārācchāstrīyābhedadṛṣṭyā mahattvoktiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2652: yathā vāmadevasyāhaṃ manuriti sarvātmatvoktirityavirodhamāha- śāstreti. END BsRp_2,3.13.21
GSP33brsgor2u:2655: evamutkrāntyādiśrutyāṇutvamanumitaṃ, tatra śrutimapyāha- svaśabdeti /. bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapyuddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgo jīva iti,
GSP33brsgor2u:2658: tasmāduddhṛtā mātrā mānaṃ yasya sa jīvastathā //22//
GSP33brsgor2u:2666: avasthitivaiśeṣyād iti cen nābhyupagamād dhṛdi hi |
GSP33brsgor2u:2670: yuktā, jīvasya tvaṇutve saṃdehāddhyāpikāryadṛṣṭyā vyāpitvakalpanameva yuktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2673: vyabhicārādityāha- na cātrānumānamiti /. pūrvoktaśrutibhirjīvasyāṇutvaniścayāddhṛdisthatvaśrutibhirekadeśasthatvaniścayācca na dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamiti parihārabhāgārthamāha- atrocyata iti. //24//
GSP33brsgor2u:2677: ātmavattaddharmajñānasyāpyaṇutvaṃ svataḥ, kādācitkaṃ tu dehaparimāṇatvamityuktvā svata eva vyāpitvamiti matāntaramāha- guṇādveti
GSP33brsgor2u:2682: uttarasūtravyāvartyaṃ śaṅkate- kathamiti /. jñānaṃ na guṇivyatiriktadeśavyāpi, guṇatvāt, rūpavat, naca prabhāyāṃ vyabhicārastasyā api dravyatvāditi prāpte gandhe vyabhicāramāha- ata uttaramiti /. guṇasya dravyavyatireka āśrayaviśleṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2683: nanu viśliṣṭāvayavānāmalpatvādravyakṣayo na bhātītyata āha- akṣīyāmāṇamapīti /. apiravadhāraṇe pūrvāvasthāliṅgenākṣīyamāṇameva tadravyamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2686: śaṅkate- syādetaditi /. viśliṣṭānāmalpatvādityupalakṣaṇaṃ, avayavāntarāṇāṃ praveśādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2687: viśeṣo 'vayavānāṃ viśleṣapraveśarūpaḥ sannapi na jñāyate, tathāca gurutvāpacayo na bhavatīti hetoranyathāsiddhiriti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2689: tadgatarūpavadgandhasyāpyanupalabdhiprasaṅgāditi pariharati- neti /. dvitīyaṃ pratyāha- sphuṭeti /. trasareṇugandhaścetsphuṭo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2690: ato gandhasya puṣpādisthasyaiva guṇavyatireko vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2691: gandho na guṇiviśliṣṭaḥ guṇatvāt, rūpavaditi śaṅkate- rūpeti /. viśleṣasya pratyakṣatvādbādha ityāha- neti. //26//
GSP33brsgor2u:2695: ātmanaścaitanyaguṇenaiva dehavyāptirityatra śrutimāha sūtrakāraḥ- tathāca darśayatīti /. tadvyācaṣṭe- hṛdayeti. //27//
GSP33brsgor2u:2699: tatraiva śrutyantarārthaṃ sūtram- pṛthagiti /. vijñānamindriyāṇāṃ jñānaśaktiṃ vijñānena caitanyaguṇenādāya śeta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2704: tatrātmāṇutvavibhutvaśrutīnāṃ virodhādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvaṇutvaṃ jīvasya vibhutvamīśvarasyetyavirodha ityekadeśipakṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2705: taṃ dūṣayansiddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- tuśabda ityādinā /. tasmādbrahmābhinnatvādvibhurjīvaḥ brahmavadityanumānānugṛhite śrutismṛti
GSP33brsgor2u:2706: āha- tathāca sa vā eṣa iti /. nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇurityādyāḥ smārtavādāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2707: etena jīvasya brahmabedajñāne 'ṇutvābhāvadhīstasyāṃ tadityanyonyāśraya iti nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2711: laukikanyāyādapi teṣāṃ durbalatvāditi matvāha- na cāṇoriti /. śaṅkate- tvagiti /. yadyaṇvātmasaṃbandhasya tvagvyāptyā dehavyāpinī vedanā syāttarhyatiprasaṅga iti dūṣayati- neti /. prasaṅgasyeṣṭhatvaṃ nirasyati- pādatala eveti /. tasmādalpamahatoḥ saṃyogo na mahadvyāpī, kaṇṭakasaṃyogasya
GSP33brsgor2u:2713: naca siddhānte tvagātmasaṃbandhasya vyāpitvātkaṇṭakasaṃbandhe dehavyāpivedanāprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2715: na caivaṃ viṣayatvaksaṃbandha eva taddheturastu kimātmavyāptyeti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2716: vedanā hi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tadanubhavaśca, na caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2718: na caiṣāṃ vyāpakatvamasiddhaṃ, sūryataptasya gaṅgānimagnasya sarvāṅgavyāpiduḥkhasukhānubhavasya durapahnavatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2719: yaduktaṃ guṇasyāpi guṇiviśleṣo gandhavaditi, tannetyāha- na cāṇoriti /. gandho nāśrayādviśliṣṭaḥ, guṇatvāt, rūpavadityatrāgamamāha- tathā coktamiti /. naca pratyakṣabādhaḥ, gandhasya pratyakṣatve 'pi
GSP33brsgor2u:2723: pūrvaṃ caitanyasya guṇatvamupetya tadvyāptyā guṇyātmāṇutvaṃ nirastaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2724: saṃprati tasya guṇatvamasiddhamityāha- yadi ca caitanyamiti /. utsūtraṃ vibhutvaṃ prasādhyāṇutvādyuktergatipradarśanārthaṃ sūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2725: vyācaṣṭe- kathamityādinā /. 'antarā vijñānamanasī hṛdi hi'iti ca prakṛtā buddhiryogyatvāttacchabdena
GSP33brsgor2u:2728: ānantyaśrutivirodhādityāha- tathāceti /. akāryakāraṇadravyasamānādhikaraṇatayā tattvamasīti vākyasya so 'yamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:2732: tatrādyaṃ nirasya dvitīyaṃ nirasyati- tathetarasminnapīti /. buddherguṇena nimittenātmanyadhyasto guṇo bhavati tenātmaguṇenādhyastenaivārāgraparimāṇo 'pakṛṣṭaśca jīvo dṛṣṭaḥ svatastvananta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2733: 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2734: jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'ityuktvā 'eṣo 'ṇurātmā'ityuktaḥ para eva, yadi jīvastathāpyadhyastāṇutvamaṇuśabdārtha ityāha- jīvasyāpīti /. yaduktaṃ pṛthagupadeśāccaitanyaguṇenaivātmano dehavyāptiriti, tatrāha- tathā prajñayeti /. buddhiḥ prajñetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2735: yadi caitanyaṃ prajñā tadā bhedopacāra ityāha- vyapadeśamātraṃ veti /. nanu caitanyaṃ guṇa iti bhedo mukhyo 'stu, netyāha- na hyatreti /. nirguṇatvaśruterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2736: anyadapi pūrvoktaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamityāha- hṛdayetyādinā /. sautraṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vivṛṇoti- yatheti /. asattvamityāpātataḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2742: nanu svataḥ saṃsāritvamastu kiṃ buddhyupādhinetyata āha- yāvadeva cāyamiti /. samāno buddhitādātmyāpannaḥ san vijñānaṃ brahma tanmayo vikāro
GSP33brsgor2u:2744: kiṃ na syādityata āha- pradeśāntara iti /. vijñānamayo buddhipracura ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2747: viyogāsaṃbhavācceti yuktyāpyāha- apica mithyeti /. samyagjñānādeva buddhyādibandhadhvaṃsa ityatra śrutimāha- darśayatīti /. mṛtyumatyetītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2753: yāvadātmabhāvitvasyāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate- nanviti /. suṣuptau buddhisattve brahmasaṃpattirna syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2758: svāpe bījātmanā sato buddhayādeḥ prabodhe 'bhivyaktirityatra śrutimāha- darśayatīti /. na vidurityavidyātmakabījasadbhāvoktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2763: buddhisadbhāve mānamāha sūtrakāraḥ- nityeti /. 'manasā hyeva paśyati, 'buddhiśca na viceṣṭati,'
GSP33brsgor2u:2765: tatra tatra śrutiṣu manaādipadavācyaṃ tāvadbuddhidravyaṃ prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2766: kathamekasyānekadhoktiḥ, tatrāha- kvacicceti /. garvavṛttiko 'haṅkāro vijñānaṃ citpradhānaṃ smṛtipradhānaṃ vā cittamityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2767: yadyapi sākṣipratyakṣasiddhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutyanūditaṃ ca tathāpi pratyakṣaśrutyorvivadamānaṃ prati vyāsaṅgānupapattyā tatsādhayati- taccetyādinā /. sūtraṃ yojayati- anyatheti /. pañcendriyāṇāṃ pañcaviṣayasaṃbandhe sati nityaṃ yugapatpañcopalabdhayaḥ syuḥ, mano 'tiriktasāmagryāḥ sattvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2770: nanu satyapi kāragrisaṃyoge dāhakādācitkatvavadupalabdhikādācitkatvamastu kiṃ manasetyāśaṅkyānyataraniyamo vetyetadvyācaṣṭe- athaveti /. satyāṃ sāmagryāṃ nityopalabdhirvāṅgīkāryā anyatarasya kāraṇasya kenapicchaktipratibandhaniyamo vāṅgīkāryaḥ, yathā maṇināgniśaktipratibandha iti vākārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2771: astu pratibandha ityata āha- naceti /. na cendriyasyaivāstu śaktipratibandha iti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2777: tatrātmano 'saṅganirguṇakūṭasthasya guṇitvāyogānmana eva guṇitvenaiṣṭavyamiti vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2779: na cānicchato 'pi durgandhādyupalambhānna bubhutsopalabdhirniyāmiketi vācyam, anekaviṣayasaṃnidhau kvacideva tasyā niyāmakatvāṅgīkārāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2780: teṣāṃ mate punaricchādīnāmātmadharmatvaṃ teṣāṃ mano durlabhamiti mantavyam
GSP33brsgor2u:2782: saṃprati vyāsaṅgasya mānasatve śrutimāha- tathāceti /. na kevalaṃ vyāsaṅgānmanaḥsiddhiḥ, kintu kāmādyāśrayatvenāpītyāha- kāmādayaśceti /. buddheḥ prāmāṇiktavoktiphalamāha- tasmāditi. //32//
GSP33brsgor2u:2787: saṃprati tato bahiṣṭhaṃ kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati- kartā śāstrārthavattvāt /. sa nityaścidrūpo mahānātmā kartā na vetyasaṅgatvaśrutīnāṃ vidhyādiśrutīnāṃ ca vipratipattyā saṃśaye buddhikartṛtvenaiva vidhyādiśāstropapatterakartātmeti sāṃkhyapakṣaprāptau siddhāntayannaiva tadguṇasāratvoktyātmani kartṛtvādhyāsasyāpi siddhatvātpunaruktimāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor2u:2793: yadvātra pūrvapakṣe bandhābhāvācchāstravaiyarthyaṃ phalaṃ, siddhānte kartṛtvādisaṃbandhasattvācchāstrārthavatteti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2794: nanu buddhikartṛtvena śāstrārthavattāstu kiṃ jīvakartṛtvena tatrāha- taddhi kartuḥ sata iti /. mayedaṃ kartavyamiti bodhasamarthasya cetanasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ na tvacetanāyā buddheḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2795: kiṃ ca bhokturātmana eva kartṛtā vācyā 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari'iti
GSP33brsgor2u:2801: amṛtaḥ sa ātmā yatheṣṭamīyate gacchatīti vihāropadeśāt, ātmā kartā //34//
GSP33brsgor2u:2805: prāṇānāṃ madhye vijñānena buddhyā vijñānasamarthamindriyajātamādāya śete iti prāṇān gṛhītvā parivartata iti upādānakartṛtvamātmanaḥ akartṛtve upādānānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:2808: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ |
GSP33brsgor2u:2809: vijñānaśabdo jīvasya nirdeśo na cet tadā prathamānirdeśādviparyayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2811: tasmādiha śrutau tanuta ityākhyātena kartṛvācinā vijñānapadasya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśātkriyāyāmātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ sūcyata iti sūtrabhāṣyayorarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brsgor2u:2815: sūtrāntaramavatārayati- atrāheti /. jīvaḥ svatantraścediṣṭameva kuryādasvatantraścenna kartā, 'svatantraḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2817: satyapi svātantrye kārakavaicitryādaniyatā pravṛttiriti sūtreṇa pariharati- yatheti /. dṛṣṭāntāsaṃpratipattyā śaṅkate- upalabdhāvapīti /. cakṣurādīnāṃ caitanyena viṣayasaṃbandhārthatvātsvasaṃbandhopalabdhau cātmanaścaitanyasvabhāvatvena svātantryāddṛṣṭāntasiddhirityāha- neti /. nanvātmā viṣayasaṃbandhāya karaṇānyapekṣate cetkathaṃ svatantra ityāśaṅkyamāha- apiceti
GSP33brsgor2u:2818: svātantryaṃ nāma na svānyānapekṣatvam, īśvarasyāpi prāṇikarmāpekṣatvenāsvātantryaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsgor2u:2819: kiṃ tu svetarakārakaprayoktṛtve sati kārakāpreryatvaṃ svātantryaṃ tena svatantro 'pi jīva iṣṭasādhanatvabhrāntyaniṣṭasādhanamapyanutiṣṭhatītyaniyatā pravṛttiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2824: jīvasya kartṛtve hetvantarārthaṃ sūtram- śaktīti /. buddheḥ karaṇaśaktiviparītā kartṛśaktiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2825: tataḥ kiṃ, tatrāha- satyāṃ ca buddheriti /. yo 'handhīgamyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2826: sa kartā sa eva jīvo yattadapekṣitaṃ karaṇaṃ tanmana iti jīvakartṛtvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsgor2u:2830: jñānasādhanavidhyanyathānupapattyāpyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ vācyamityāha- samādhīti /. muktiphalabhoktureva tadupāyasamādhikartṛtvaṃ yuktam, anyathātmano
GSP33brsgor2u:2836: yathā ca takṣobhayathā /. uktamātmanaḥ kartṛtvamupajīvya saṃśayapūrvapakṣāvāha- evaṃ tāvadityādinā /. sāṃkhyanirāsenātmanaḥ kartṛtve sādhite bādhakābhāvāt tatsatyamiti mīmāṃsakādipakṣaḥ prāptaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2837: na cāsaṅgatvāgamena bādhaḥ, ahaṃ kartetyanubhavasahitakartṛtvaśrutibalena tasyāgamasya stāvakatvāditi prāpta utsūtrameva siddhāntayati- na svābhāvikamiti /. yaduktaṃ bādhakābhāvāditi tadasiddhamityāha- anirmokṣeti /. nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate- nanu sthitāyāmiti /. satyāṃ śaktau kathaṃ kāryaparihāraḥ, tatrāha- tatparihāraśceti /. muktau śaktisattve kāryamapi syāt, śakyābhāve śaktyayogāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2838: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ, tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati- na nimittānāmapīti /. sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2840: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brsgor2u:2843: yadi karmaṇā mokṣaḥ. tatrāha- neti /. ātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamabhayupagamyānirmokṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2844: saṃpratyasaṅganirvikāratvānekaśrutivyākopāttanna svābhāvikamityāha- apiceti /. nacābhyastānekaśrutīnāṃ stāvakatvakalpanaṃ yuktaṃ, na cāhaṃ kartetyanubhavo virudhyate, tasya satyamithyodāsīnakartṛtvāvagāhino 'dhyāsatvenāpyupapatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2845: kartṛtvasyādhyastatve śrutimāha- tathāceti /. vidvadanubhavabādhitaṃ ca kartṛtvamityāha- nahīti /. buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta, taccāniṣṭaṃ, parasya nityamuktatvavyāghātāditi śaṅkate- para eveti /. na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ, kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2847: pariharati- nāvidyeti /. avidyopahito bandho na śūddhātmanītyatra śrutimāha- tathāceti /. kartṛtvasya buddhyupādhyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvācchruteśca na
GSP33brsgor2u:2848: svābhāvikatvamityāha- tathā svapneti /. ātmaiva kāmyate ānandatvādityātmakāmaṃ svarūpaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2852: gatiḥ prāpyaṃ, saṃpadaiśvaryaṃ loko bogyaṃ sukhaṃ,
